T02D2663b-2:4b-26: bkrus pa'i 'og tu sngags de rnams phyag rgya dang

T02D2663b-2:10b-14: kyis sems can rnams la nad 'go ba gtong ngo

T02D2663b-2:10b-27: rnams byed pa'i tshe ma mo rnams kyi sngags kyi
T02D2663b-2:10b-28: tshig bzhin byas na sems can 'chi bar byed pa
T02D2663b-2:10b-29: dang lha dang lha ma yin du 'thab pa'i tshe

T02D2663b-2:11a-30: rigs kyi bu dag 'on kyang gsang sngags kyi byin

T02D2663b-2:11b-1: 'das pa'i dus na grub pa'i rang bzhin yin na

T02D2663b-2:11b-12: zhes pa ni dper na me tog sna tshogs dang
T02D2663b-2:11b-13: 'dra ste / sa bon dang myu gu dang lo
T02D2663b-2:11b-14: ma'i tshe kha dog sngon po la sogs pa gzhan
T02D2663b-2:11b-15: 'dra ste / la / me tog du gyur pa'i
T02D2663b-2:11b-16: tshe kha dog gzhan du gyur pa lta bus rtsva
T02D2663b-2:11b-17: rtsub mo dang sngon po la sogs pa zos kyang
T02D2663b-2:11b-18: 'o ma 'jam zhing dkar ba'i rang bzhin du gyur

T02D2663b-2:11b-23: tu tshogs pa sngags kyi chos nyid kyis byin gyi
T02D2663b-2:11b-24: rlabs las grub pa rab 'bring rnam pa gsum la

T02D2663b-2:11b-30: grub pa nyid la chos nyid kyis byin gyis rlob
T02D2663b-2:11b-31: cing grub pa thob pa de dag brtan zhing mi
T02D2663b-2:11b-32: de / 'gyur pa'o // rigs kyi bu dag de
T02D2663b-2:11b-33: lta bas na chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngo
T02D2663b-2:11b-34: bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin

T02D2663b-2:11b-41: nas gcig tu mngon par grag go zhes pa'i bar
T02D2663b-2:11b-42: gyis byang chub kyi rang bzhin yan lag bzhi dang
T02D2663b-2:11b-43: ldan pa'i rten ston pa'i yi ge aa rnam pa
T02D2663b-2:11b-44: bzhi bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:11b-45: aa rnam pa bzhi sngar yang bshad na /
T02D2663b-2:11b-46: ci'i phyir 'dir yang bzlas te gsungs she na /
T02D2663b-2:12a-0: sngar bshad pa ni don dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor @12a * //
T02D2663b-2:12a-1: gyur pa'i yig 'bru re re pa sbyir bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:12a-2: 'dir yang bzlas te gsungs pa ni gsang sngags sgrub
T02D2663b-2:12a-3: pas de'i don bsgom zhing bzlas par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2663b-2:12a-4: khyad par du gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:12a-5: de la dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs
T02D2663b-2:12a-6: kyi gzhi byin gyis rlob pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:12a-7: gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan rnam par dag
T02D2663b-2:12a-8: pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663b-2:12a-9: la snyoms par zhugs so zhes pa ni aa rnam
T02D2663b-2:12a-10: pa bzhi po de gsungs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-2:12a-11: ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:12a-12: de rnams kyis kyang don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi don rnam pa gnyis ston te /
T02D2663b-2:12a-13: de la don dam pa ston pa ni yi ge aa de'i sgo nas de bzhin nyid ston pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:12a-14: kun rdzob tu ston pa ni yi ge aa de
T02D2663b-2:12a-15: las skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2663b-2:12a-17: gang gi phyir yi ge brgya ba'i le'u aa 'di
T02D2663b-2:12a-18: rnams las ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2663b-2:12a-19: sbros par bshad de yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis

T02D2663b-2:12a-23: de la dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs
T02D2663b-2:12a-24: kyi gzhi zhes pa ni don dam pa ni de
T02D2663b-2:12a-25: bzhin nyid de yi ge aa rnams kyi rten du
T02D2663b-2:12a-27: dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs zhes pa
T02D2663b-2:12a-28: na da bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin mi 'gyur bar
T02D2663b-2:12a-29: yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas nam mkha'
T02D2663b-2:12a-30: dang 'dra pa ste dus gsum du thogs pa med

T02D2663b-2:12a-33: yi ge aa'i 'brur byin gyis rlob pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:12a-34: 'khor ba'i mtha' ji srid kyi bar du yi ge
T02D2663b-2:12a-35: aa rnams su lhag par gnas zhes pa'i don te
T02D2663b-2:12a-36: de ni don dam pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:12a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
T02D2663b-2:12a-38: rgyan rnam bar dag pa zhes pa ni kun rdzob
T02D2663b-2:12a-39: tu yi ge aa las skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
T02D2663b-2:12a-40: sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams byung bar bstan pa ste
T02D2663b-2:12a-41: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab
T02D2663b-2:12a-42: pa zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam

T02D2663b-2:12b-3: sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams te mtshan de rnams te
T02D2663b-2:12b-4: de aa bzhi po 'di las byung bas na rgyan
T02D2663b-2:12b-5: zhes pa aa 'di rnams nyid la bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:12b-6: rnam par dag pa zhes pa ni mtshan sum cu
T02D2663b-2:12b-7: rtsa gnyis po de rnams yul na gnas pa dang
T02D2663b-2:12b-8: gsal ba nang kun du rdzogs pas na rnam par
T02D2663b-2:12b-10: snying po can zhes pa ni 'byung ba'i gnas zhes pa'i don te /

T02D2663b-2:12b-17: par dag pa'i snying po can zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:12b-18: chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa ji snyed yod pa
T02D2663b-2:12b-19: rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra rnams las chos
T02D2663b-2:12b-20: kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi stobs /
T02D2663b-2:12b-21: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs /
T02D2663b-2:12b-22: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mos pa
T02D2663b-2:12b-23: las byung ba gnas skabs bzhi dbyangs gcig las byung

T02D2663b-2:12b-26: pa la / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa ji
T02D2663b-2:12b-27: snyed yod pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i sgra
T02D2663b-2:12b-28: zhes pa ni gnas skabs bzhi dbyangs gcig las byung
T02D2663b-2:12b-30: aa bzhi po 'di ma skyes pa'i sgra 'byung ba
T02D2663b-2:12b-31: las rnam par rig pas na bum pa la sogs
T02D2663b-2:12b-32: pa'i chos rnams kyi tshig thams cad kyang ma skyes
T02D2663b-2:12b-33: pa'i tshig tu 'du bar 'gyur ba'i aa bzhi po
T02D2663b-2:12b-34: chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi stobs zhes bya ba

T02D2663b-2:12b-42: rgyas kyi mos pa las byung ba zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:13a-0: de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu'i tshen yang dag @13a *
T02D2663b-2:13a-1: ro // pa'o // // par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:13a-2: kyi yon tan rnams la mos pa ji lta ba
T02D2663b-2:13a-3: bzhin du mngon par byang chub pa'i tshen yongs su
T02D2663b-2:13a-4: rdzogs gyur pa de las yi ge aa bzhi po
T02D2663b-2:13a-6: dbyangs gcig las byung bas zhes pa ni bum pa

T02D2663b-2:13a-8: sgra gcig pu las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:13a-9: chos dbyings thams cad khyab par byas te nam mkha'
T02D2663b-2:13a-10: dang mnyam par gyur nas zhes pa ni ma skyes
T02D2663b-2:13a-11: pa'i sgras chos kyi dbyings thams cad nam mkhas khyab

T02D2663b-2:13a-13: chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam par byas nas zhes pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:13a-14: chos kyi dbyings zhes pa 'di yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su rig par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:13a-15: yi ge aa ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin te
T02D2663b-2:13a-16: rnam pa bzhi ni byang chub de yan lag bzhi
T02D2663b-2:13a-17: dang ldan pa ste byang chub dang /
T02D2663b-2:13a-19: kun du sangs rgyas pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:13a-20: mya ngan las 'das pa rnams su reg pa bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:13a-21: de dag byung mthag tu de nas yang chos kyi
T02D2663b-2:13a-22: dbyings thams cad nges par sgrogs pa'i sgo dag nas
T02D2663b-2:13a-23: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi snying po'i
T02D2663b-2:13a-24: tshig gis mtshan pa rnam par rig pa'i dbyangs kyi
T02D2663b-2:13a-25: sgra gcig nas gcig tu mngon par grag go zhes
T02D2663b-2:13a-26: pa ni snying po de rnams gsungs pa dang 'jig
T02D2663b-2:13a-27: rten gyi chos rnams kyi sgra las de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-2:13a-28: pa'i tshig gis mtshan pa ma byung ma skyes pa'i
T02D2663b-2:13a-30: byang chub sems dpas de thos nas //
T02D2663b-2:13a-32: nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas //
T02D2663b-2:13a-33: rtag tu mngon par brtson par bya //
T02D2663b-2:13a-34: zhes pa'i bar gyis de ltar ma skyes pa'i sgra
T02D2663b-2:13a-35: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa byang
T02D2663b-2:13a-36: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thos nas ngo mtshar du
T02D2663b-2:13a-37: gyur te de'i rjes su bsngags pa bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-2:13a-39: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2663b-2:13a-40: snying po rnams sgrub pa 'byung ste zhes pa nas

T02D2663b-2:19a-17: 'khor dang bcas par bsam mo zhes pa'o //

T02D2663b-2:19a-19: rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:19a-20: der 'dug nas ni thams cad bsam //
T02D2663b-2:19a-21: zhes pa ni de las yi ge aa la sogs
T02D2663b-2:19a-22: pa rnams rim pa bzhin du bsam mo zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-2:19a-23: // rnal 'byor gnas zhes bshad pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:19a-24: zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas
T02D2663b-2:19a-25: pa'i sku de rnal 'byor gyi gnas yin pas rnal
T02D2663b-2:19a-27: aa ni srog gi dam pa ste //
T02D2663b-2:19a-28: 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog tu bshad //
T02D2663b-2:19a-29: ces pa ni sngags pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-2:19a-30: la gnas nas yi ge aa de kha dog gser
T02D2663b-2:19a-31: btso ma lta bu nang gi dkyil 'khor dbugs kyi
T02D2663b-2:19a-32: rlung gis gyen du phul bar bsams la /
T02D2663b-2:19a-33: bdag gi sna'i bu gnas byung ste pha rol po
T02D2663b-2:19a-34: nad pa'i sna'i bu gar zhugs nas khong thams cad
T02D2663b-2:19a-35: du khyab pa ni chu'i nang du ras bting ba'am
T02D2663b-2:19a-36: // g-yag rnga bkram pa dang 'dra bar bsams te
T02D2663b-2:19a-37: slar yid kyis aa de dbugs dang bcas par drang
T02D2663b-2:19a-38: bar bsams te ras sam g-yag rnga chu nang du
T02D2663b-2:19a-39: bkram pa'i dpung nas bzung nas drangs na zhum par
T02D2663b-2:19a-40: 'gyur pa de ltar bsams nas des nad thams cad
T02D2663b-2:19a-41: aa'i rang bzhin la bsdus te slar yang nad pa'i
T02D2663b-2:19a-43: bdag gi khong du zhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2663b-2:19a-44: de bzhin du lan mang du goms par byas na thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663b-2:19a-45: de bzhin du sems drangs na yang aa de snga
T02D2663b-2:19a-46: ma bzhin du rlung dang bcas pa bdag gi lus
T02D2663b-2:19b-0: las pha rol gyi lus @19b la 'jug par bsams
T02D2663b-2:19b-1: te / khyad par du bdag gi dbugs dang pha
T02D2663b-2:19b-2: rol gyi dbugs gnyis 'dres te gcig tu gyur par
T02D2663b-2:19b-3: bsams nas aa snga ma bzhin du slar drangs na
T02D2663b-2:19b-5: de bzhin du aa das bsdu bar bya ba'i mig
T02D2663b-2:19b-6: la sogs pa'i dbang po'i rgyud la khyab par bsams
T02D2663b-2:19b-7: te slar drangs na rkang pas 'ong bar 'gyur ro
T02D2663b-2:19b-8: // yang snga ma bzhin du bsams te aa des
T02D2663b-2:19b-9: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus kyi nang thams cad du
T02D2663b-2:19b-10: khyab par bsams te slar drangs na gong bu 'gugs
T02D2663b-2:19b-11: // par 'gyur ro // nam zhig klad kor gyis sel bar 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:19b-13: sngags pa nam zhig zla gcig tu //
T02D2663b-2:19b-15: lha dang lha min rnams kyis kyang //
T02D2663b-2:19b-16: mi byed shin tu brtag par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:19b-17: zhes pa'i bar gyis bzlas pa las byung ba'i grub pa bshad de /
T02D2663b-2:19b-18: bdag gi lus snga ma bzhin du bsgyur nas snga
T02D2663b-2:19b-19: dro mel tshe thun gcig / gung la mel tshe
T02D2663b-2:19b-20: thun phyed du bzlas pa zla gcig gi bar du
T02D2663b-2:19b-21: byas na ma rig pa bsal bar 'gyur zhing lha
T02D2663b-2:19b-22: dang lha ma yin la sogs pas kyang mi tshugs
T02D2663b-2:19b-24: bdag gi rnyed pa 'grub bya'i phyir //
T02D2663b-2:19b-25: rgyas pa'i las ni gang cung zad //
T02D2663b-2:19b-26: de kun rtag tu sngags pa yis //
T02D2663b-2:19b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su bya //
T02D2663b-2:19b-28: zhes pa ni rgyas pa'i las dang bdag gi longs
T02D2663b-2:19b-29: sbyod bsgrub pa la sogs pa yang dkyil 'khor la
T02D2663b-2:19b-30: gnas te / sgrub pa po zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:19b-31: gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas //
T02D2663b-2:19b-32: thor tshugs dbu rgyan 'chang ba yi //
T02D2663b-2:19b-33: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting 'dzin bzhugs //
T02D2663b-2:19b-34: dbang chen gyi ni gzhi zhes bya //
T02D2663b-2:19b-35: zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la bcom
T02D2663b-2:19b-36: ldan 'das kyi sku 'di lta bur bzhugs par bsam
T02D2663b-2:19b-37: zhes pa'o // rdo rje padma ral gri dang //
T02D2663b-2:19b-39: dbang chen du ni bsgoms te bsgrub //
T02D2663b-2:19b-40: ces bya ba'i bar gyis rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:19b-41: rdzas de rnams sngags pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-2:19b-42: la gnas nas rgyud gzhan dag las 'byung ba'i rim
T02D2663b-2:19b-44: mnan bdag kyang bshad par bya //
T02D2663b-2:19b-45: 'di ni khyed kyis mnyam gzhag nyon //
T02D2663b-2:19b-47: de ni mi g-yo gnas par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:20a-0: zhes pa'i bar gyis pha rol gyi rgol ba la sogs pa mnan @20a * //
T02D2663b-2:20a-2: sngags bas snga ma bzhin du dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D2663b-2:20a-3: 'khor la gnas par bsams nas mnan par bya ba'i
T02D2663b-2:20a-4: spyi bor ri rab shin tu ser zhing lci ba
T02D2663b-2:20a-5: rtse mo brgyad pa bsams te /
T02D2663b-2:20a-6: de'i steng du padmo bsam zhing padma'i steng du rdo rje rgya gram bsams la /
T02D2663b-2:20a-7: steng du aa de las bcom ldan 'das kyi sku
T02D2663b-2:20a-8: bsams te mnan par bya ba rnams kyi spyi bo
T02D2663b-2:20a-9: non par bsams na thams cad mi g-yo bar 'gyur
T02D2663b-2:20a-10: ro zhes pa'o // sman la yang ni lan brgya ru //
T02D2663b-2:20a-12: sngon gyi las las byung ba yi //
T02D2663b-2:20a-14: zhes pa'i bar ni bdag sda ma bzhin du bsams
T02D2663b-2:20a-15: te sman la lan brgya bsngags nas nad pa la
T02D2663b-2:20a-16: blud na nad 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:20a-17: de nas gzhan yang nges pa yis //
T02D2663b-2:20a-19: klad kyi 'khor dang bcas byas na //
T02D2663b-2:20a-20: sel bar byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:20a-21: zhes pa'i bar gyis pa'i sgrub pa rnams bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:20a-22: yi ge ba bsams pa yang dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor du bsams pa ni snga ma bzhin te /
T02D2663b-2:20a-23: de las khyad par du na nang gi dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor lte ba'i thad kar bsam mo //
T02D2663b-2:20a-25: lte ba'i dbus nas byung ba ste //
T02D2663b-2:20a-26: padma dkar po dam pa ni //
T02D2663b-2:20a-27: de yi dbus na rab tu gnas //
T02D2663b-2:20a-28: mgo na po dam pa rab tu zhi //
T02D2663b-2:20a-30: gdung ba thams cad zhi byed pa //
T02D2663b-2:20a-31: smug zil 'dus pa'i nang na gnas //
T02D2663b-2:20a-32: zhes pa'i bar gyis ba'i las gcig bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:20a-33: bdag nyid dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur nas
T02D2663b-2:20a-34: nang gi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lte ba'i thad kar
T02D2663b-2:20a-35: bsams te de'i steng du padma dkar po kha ba
T02D2663b-2:20a-36: dang 'o ma dang dung 'dra ba ste ba'i nang
T02D2663b-2:20a-37: nas byung ba 'dug par bsams shing padma'i steng du
T02D2663b-2:20a-38: yi ge ba ston gyi zla ba'i kha dog 'dra
T02D2663b-2:20a-39: ba bsams la ba las chu rgyun dgu 'byung bas
T02D2663b-2:20a-40: sgor ba chu'i dkyil 'khor zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba
T02D2663b-2:20a-41: de'i gzhir gyur pa yang bsams la /
T02D2663b-2:20a-42: yi ge bde yang bum pa 'dra ba smug pa'i
T02D2663b-2:20a-43: zil pa dkar po 'dus pa 'dra ba'i nang na
T02D2663b-2:20a-45: bdag gi lus kyi nang thams cad khyab par bsams
T02D2663b-2:20a-46: na gdug pa dang tsha ba'i rims la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:20a-48: de bzhin du bdag gi lus dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D2663b-2:20b-0: 'khor la @20b 'dug par bsams la gzhan gyi lus
T02D2663b-2:20b-1: la yang bde de bzhin du bsams na gdug pa
T02D2663b-2:20b-2: dang tsha ba'i rims la sogs pa 'byang bar 'gyur
T02D2663b-2:20b-3: ro // 'o ma mu tig phreng dkar dang //
T02D2663b-2:20b-5: sngags pas yid la bsams na ni //
T02D2663b-2:20b-6: gdung ba kun las thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:20b-7: zhes pa'i bar gyis pa'i las gzhan bshad de /
T02D2663b-2:20b-8: yi ge ba de snga ma bzhin du bsams nas
T02D2663b-2:20b-9: smug zil med par bde las chu rgyun dkar po
T02D2663b-2:20b-10: byung ste / chu rgyun des pa de la bskor nas 'khyil bar 'dug par bsams la /
T02D2663b-2:20b-11: de bdag gi dbugs kyis bskyod nas rang gi lus
T02D2663b-2:20b-12: thams cad du khyab par bsams na de gdung ba
T02D2663b-2:20b-13: la sogs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2663b-2:20b-14: de bzhin du pha rol la bsams na yang gdung
T02D2663b-2:20b-15: ba la sogs pa'i nad rnams de lta bur zhi
T02D2663b-2:20b-16: bar 'gyur ro // mnyam par gzhag pa dngos 'di rnams //
T02D2663b-2:20b-20: zhi bar byed par bsam pa 'di //
T02D2663b-2:20b-21: zhes pa'i bar gyis ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor
T02D2663b-2:20b-22: la gnas nas rdo rje la sogs pa dang rdzas
T02D2663b-2:20b-23: ming gis smos pa de rnams bsgrubs na tshe ring
T02D2663b-2:20b-24: ba la sogs pa'i grub ba rnams thob par 'gyur
T02D2663b-2:20b-25: te / rim pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:20b-26: klad kyi kor dang bcas byas nas //
T02D2663b-2:20b-27: sel bar byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:20b-28: zhes pa ni nad pa'i lus la ba de klad
T02D2663b-2:20b-29: kor dang bcas par bsams nab ni gzung ba'i chos
T02D2663b-2:20b-30: thams cad stong bar byed la /
T02D2663b-2:20b-31: klad kor ni 'dzin pa thams cad stong par ston par byed la /
T02D2663b-2:20b-32: de ltar lus de gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis
T02D2663b-2:20b-33: ka dang bral te stong bas nad kyang stong pa'i
T02D2663b-2:20b-34: rang bzhin du 'dus nas med par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2663b-2:20b-35: ra zhes bya ba yang dag mchog / ces pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:20b-36: me dang lhan cig 'di spyar na //
T02D2663b-2:20b-37: zhes pa'i bar gyis ra'i sgrub pa dang las rnams bshad de /
T02D2663b-2:20b-38: ra zhes bya ba yang dag mchog / ces pa
T02D2663b-2:20b-39: ni chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba'i ting nge
T02D2663b-2:20b-40: 'dzin stong pa'i rang bzhin mchog gi de bzhin nyid
T02D2663b-2:20b-41: de ra'i yi ge des ston pas na mchog gi
T02D2663b-2:20b-42: de bzhin nyid ces bya ste don dam pa'i mtshan
T02D2663b-2:20b-43: nyid do // 'od can rnams kyi 'od ces bya //
T02D2663b-2:20b-44: zhes pa ni 'od can ni nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:21a-2: yi ge ra ni me'i sa bon yin pas 'od
T02D2663b-2:21a-3: can rnams kyi mchog ces bya ste kun rdzob kyi
T02D2663b-2:21a-5: des ni las rnams gang cung zad //
T02D2663b-2:21a-6: mtshams med lnga las byung ba yang //
T02D2663b-2:21a-7: rnal 'byor shin tu mnyam bzhag nas //
T02D2663b-2:21a-8: bsams na de kun zad bar 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:21a-9: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni de bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:21a-10: chos thams cad rdul dang bral ba stong pa nyid
T02D2663b-2:21a-11: kyi rang bzhin du bsgoms na mi dge ba bcu
T02D2663b-2:21a-12: la sogs pa'i las rnams dang mtshams med pa la
T02D2663b-2:21a-13: sogs pa dmigs su med pas de dag gi 'bras
T02D2663b-2:21a-14: bu zad cing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2663b-2:21a-15: yid 'ong thams cad rab tu dmar //
T02D2663b-2:21a-16: gru gsum pa yi tshul du gnas //
T02D2663b-2:21a-18: sum mdo'i ris mtshan snying gar gzhag / ces pa
T02D2663b-2:21a-19: ni me'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid de snying gar
T02D2663b-2:21a-20: nang gi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gru
T02D2663b-2:21a-21: gsum shin tu dmar ba 'greng bur 'dug ba gru
T02D2663b-2:21a-22: gsum gyi mtshan mas btab par bsam mo zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-2:21a-24: ra ni klad kor bcas par bsam /
T02D2663b-2:21a-25: zhes pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid kyi
T02D2663b-2:21a-26: dbus na yi ge ra kha dog dmar po klad
T02D2663b-2:21a-27: kor dang bcas pa 'greng bur 'dug par bsam zhes
T02D2663b-2:21a-28: pa ste / klad kor dang bcas pa ni kun
T02D2663b-2:21a-29: du sangs rgyas pa'i snying po gzung ba dang 'dzin
T02D2663b-2:21a-30: pa gnyis dang bral bar ston pa yin la /
T02D2663b-2:21a-31: de bzhin du yi ge ba yang klad kor med
T02D2663b-2:21a-32: kyang kun du sangs rgyas pa'i snying po yin pas
T02D2663b-2:21a-33: ba'i bu ga nyid klad kor lta bur 'dzin pa
T02D2663b-2:21a-35: mi 'jig bas ni ci rigs par //
T02D2663b-2:21a-36: dngos po 'di dag der bsgrub po //
T02D2663b-2:21a-38: me dang lhan cig 'dir sbyar na //
T02D2663b-2:21a-39: de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:21a-40: zhes pa'i bar gyis yi ge ra'i sgrub pa dang las rnams bshad de /
T02D2663b-2:21a-41: sngags ba ra'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas sgrub ba
T02D2663b-2:21a-42: ming gis smos pa rnams rgyud dang rtog pa gzhan
T02D2663b-2:21a-43: las byung ba'i cho gas rdzas kyi mtshan ma dang
T02D2663b-2:21a-44: bcas pa'am / mtshan ma med pas bsgrubs na nyi
T02D2663b-2:21a-45: ma la sogs pa grub ste ci bsgo ba nyan
T02D2663b-2:21a-46: bcas pa'am / to / ha zhes bya ba dam pa mchog / ces pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:21a-47: rgyu kun dmigs su med sgo nas //
T02D2663b-2:21b-0: bdud las rnam par @21b rgyal bar byed //
T02D2663b-2:21b-1: ces pa'i bar gyis yi ge ha'i sgrub pa dang
T02D2663b-2:21b-2: yon tan dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa bshad pa
T02D2663b-2:21b-3: ste / ha zhes bya ba dam pa mchog /
T02D2663b-2:21b-4: ces pa ni chos thams cad rgyu dang bral bar
T02D2663b-2:21b-5: ston pa'i rang bzhin yin pas de kho na nyid
T02D2663b-2:21b-7: rlung ni thams cad yang dag 'byung //
T02D2663b-2:21b-8: zhes pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor las 'byung ba'am /
T02D2663b-2:21b-9: de las rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'byung bas so //
T02D2663b-2:21b-10: rgyu dang las dang 'bras bu dang //
T02D2663b-2:21b-11: gang gis sa bon rnams skye ba //
T02D2663b-2:21b-12: 'di ni klad kor bcas sbyar na //

T02D2663b-2:21b-14: ces ba ni de'i rang bzhin bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu bstan pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:21b-15: ha zhes pa klad kor dang bcas par bsams pas
T02D2663b-2:21b-16: chos thams cad rgyu dang bral ba'i tshul gyis gzung
T02D2663b-2:21b-17: ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis ka dmigs su med de
T02D2663b-2:21b-18: // rgyu zhes pa ni ma rig pa la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams so //
T02D2663b-2:21b-19: las ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas dge
T02D2663b-2:21b-20: ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa rnams so
T02D2663b-2:21b-21: // 'bras bu ni las de dag gi rnam par
T02D2663b-2:21b-22: smin pa ngan song dang bde 'gro la sogs pa'o
T02D2663b-2:21b-23: // // gang gis sa bon rnams skye ba //

T02D2663b-2:21b-25: yang phung po rnams skye ba ste de dag thams

T02D2663b-2:21b-28: de yi gzugs kyang bshad pa ni //
T02D2663b-2:21b-29: kha dog gnag la 'od po che //
T02D2663b-2:21b-31: kun du yang ni rnam par 'phro //
T02D2663b-2:21b-32: zhes pa ni yi ge ha nyid gzugs bstan pa ste /

T02D2663b-2:21b-44: bzlas te gsungs pa ni rab tu goms pa'i mthus
T02D2663b-2:21b-45: yi ge mi 'gyur bar bsam zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:21b-46: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni //
T02D2663b-2:21b-47: gang gis mthong ba kho na la //

T02D2663b-2:26a-4: nang na bzhugs bar bsam pa yang mdo tsam du

T02D2663b-2:26a-7: snang bar bya ba bshad pa ste /

T02D2663b-2:26a-13: du gyur pa'o // de tshe rdo rje 'od zer ni //

T02D2663b-2:26a-16: kun du snang bar byas nas su //
T02D2663b-2:26a-17: zhes pa ni de ltar ngo mtshar du gyur te

T02D2663b-2:26a-19: 'od zer me stag 'phro ba dang 'dra bas sangs
T02D2663b-2:26a-20: rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab ste snang bar gyur

T02D2663b-2:26a-22: ba yang ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams sngags kyi
T02D2663b-2:26a-23: spyod pa la dad pa bskyed pa ste sngags kyi
T02D2663b-2:26a-24: phyag rgya rdo rje gsor bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T02D2663b-2:26a-25: thams cad 'od kyis khyab pa mthong na dad pa
T02D2663b-2:26a-27: sngags kyi 'jug pa bshad lags na //

T02D2663b-2:26b-27: de ni sems kyis byed pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:26b-29: sems dpa' chen po dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2663b-2:26b-30: gnas ni yid ces bshad pa yin //

T02D2663b-2:27a-0: @27a * // zhes gong du bshad pa'i 'brel ba ste bdag gi

T02D2663b-2:27a-9: ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rnam par gyur te

T02D2663b-2:27a-38: me long phug na gnas pa bzhin //
T02D2663b-2:27a-39: zhes pa ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-2:27a-40: chu yi zla ba'i rnam pa bzhin //

T02D2663b-2:27b-0: bya'o zhes pa'o// @27b de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:27b-1: sku'i bye brag bshad pa de rnams kyang rnal 'byor

T02D2663b-2:27b-3: zhar la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum char la
T02D2663b-2:27b-5: aa zhes bya ba de ru gnas //

T02D2663b-2:27b-13: de nas sngags pas stod du yang //
T02D2663b-2:27b-15: sangs rgyas ye shes mchog gyur pa //

T02D2663b-2:36b-27: sems dad pa'i sems can ni las kyi rnam par
T02D2663b-2:36b-28: smin pa la brten te de nyid zad par 'gyur
T02D2663b-2:36b-29: gyi bcom ldan 'das ni bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D2663b-2:36b-30: kyi tshogs chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu de
T02D2663b-2:36b-32: snying po byang chub kyi sku de ni bsod nams
T02D2663b-2:36b-33: dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i rgyu mthun pa'i
T02D2663b-2:36b-34: 'bras bu yin pas rnam par smin pa lta bu
T02D2663b-2:36b-35: zhes bya'o // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag dang /
T02D2663b-2:36b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad nas zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:36b-37: snying po 'di la brtson par bya'o zhes pa'i bar
T02D2663b-2:36b-38: gyis ni yi ge aa yi ge 'khor lo bskor
T02D2663b-2:36b-39: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag por bzhag nas aa de'i
T02D2663b-2:36b-40: yon tan brjod pa dang bcas par gsungs pa yin
T02D2663b-2:36b-41: te / de la bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag
T02D2663b-2:36b-42: dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad nas zhes
T02D2663b-2:37a-0: te / pa @37a * // ni yi ge aa
T02D2663b-2:37a-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi 'khor lo sku thams
T02D2663b-2:37a-2: cad nas byung ngo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-2:37a-3: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes
T02D2663b-2:37a-4: pa la sogs pa de dag ni yi ge aa'i
T02D2663b-2:37a-5: mthu chen po bstan pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:37a-6: de la 'jig rten pa zhes pa ni mu stegs
T02D2663b-2:37a-7: kyi drang srong la sogs pa dang phyogs gcig stong
T02D2663b-2:37a-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:37a-10: nyan thos dag ni 'og nas 'byung bas na 'dir ma gtogs so //
T02D2663b-2:37a-11: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag kyang rang gi
T02D2663b-2:37a-12: rnam par grol ba phyogs gcig gi sgo stong pa
T02D2663b-2:37a-14: de rnams kyang sngags sgrub pa'i 'jug pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:37a-15: bsam gtan gyi sgor 'jug pa rnam pa gnyis te de gnyi ga'i yang srog dang 'dra ba'o //
T02D2663b-2:37a-17: de dag thams cad kyang don dam par yang la
T02D2663b-2:37a-18: la ni phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub
T02D2663b-2:37a-19: pa'i stong pa / la la ni phyogs tsam stong par lta ba ste /
T02D2663b-2:37a-20: spyir thams cad stong pa'i don la brten pas na
T02D2663b-2:37a-21: yi ge aa'i don skyes pa'i chos nyid ni de
T02D2663b-2:37a-22: dag thams cad kyi srog lta bu'o //
T02D2663b-2:37a-23: kun rdzob tu yang gang yig 'bru la brten pa'i
T02D2663b-2:37a-24: chos thams cad aa las 'gyur bas na srog lta
T02D2663b-2:37a-25: bu'o // de la bsam gtan zhes pa ni rnal 'byor te sems pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:37a-26: bsam gtan du bya ba zhes pa ni bsam pa
T02D2663b-2:37a-27: de'i 'bras bu gang yin pa ste de ni bsam
T02D2663b-2:37a-29: dngos grub sgrub pa ni rab dang 'bring dang tha
T02D2663b-2:37a-30: ma la sogs pa ste de dag sgrub pa'i phyir
T02D2663b-2:37a-31: 'jug pa de ni sngags sgrub pa'i sgor zhugs pa'o
T02D2663b-2:37a-32: // yi ge'i 'bru rnams kyang kun rdzob dang don
T02D2663b-2:37a-33: dam pa'i sgo nas srog la sogs par 'gyur ba
T02D2663b-2:37a-34: // ste / de la yi ge thams cad kyi
T02D2663b-2:37a-35: 'tsho bar gyur pa zhes pa ni byang chub kyi
T02D2663b-2:37a-36: sgo nas yi ge rnams aa la brten pa'i phyir
T02D2663b-2:37a-38: aa zhes pa'i don ni ma skyes pa yin la /
T02D2663b-2:37a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i don kyang dgos
T02D2663b-2:37a-40: pa thams cad dang bral ba ste ma skyes pa'i
T02D2663b-2:37a-41: don to // de bas na yi ge ka byang
T02D2663b-2:37a-42: chub kyi sa bon gyi 'tsho ba yang aa la
T02D2663b-2:37a-43: rag lus pa'i phyir srog ces bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:37b-0: de bzhin du yi ge lhag ma rnams kyang shes par @37b bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:37b-1: de la yi ge thams cad kyi srog tu gyur
T02D2663b-2:37b-2: pa zhes pa ni spyod pa'i sgo nas yig 'bru
T02D2663b-2:37b-3: rnams de la brten bas na de'i phyir srog ces
T02D2663b-2:37b-4: bya'o // skyabs su gyur pa zhes pa ni kun
T02D2663b-2:37b-5: du sangs rgyas pa'i sgo nas yi ge rnams kyi
T02D2663b-2:37b-6: rten yin pas na skyabs so //
T02D2663b-2:37b-7: rgyud ngo zhes pa ni mya ngan 'das pa'i sgo nas yi ge rnams byung ba'i don to //
T02D2663b-2:37b-8: rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2663b-2:37b-9: thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:37b-10: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'khor lo thams cad kyis byin
T02D2663b-2:37b-11: gyis brlabs zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-2:37b-12: byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la /
T02D2663b-2:37b-13: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas so sor nye bar gnas
T02D2663b-2:37b-14: pa yin te zhes pa ni yi ge aa de'i
T02D2663b-2:37b-15: mthu chen po bstan pa ste sangs rgyas 'jig rten
T02D2663b-2:37b-16: du 'byung ba'i tshe chos rnam pa gnyis bstan pa
T02D2663b-2:37b-17: ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:37b-18: rnam pa gnyis ni bsam pa dag pa rnams la
T02D2663b-2:37b-19: rtogs pa'i chos bstan pa dang bsam pa ma dag
T02D2663b-2:37b-20: pa rnams la lung gi chos bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:37b-21: de bzhin du yi ge aa yang chos de gnyig ston pa'i rgyu yin te /
T02D2663b-2:37b-22: de bas na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas so sor nye bar gnas pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:37b-24: rtogs pa'i chos rnams kyang yi ge aa de'i don ma skyes pa las byung la /
T02D2663b-2:37b-25: lung gi chos rnams kyang yi ge'i 'bru'i sgo nas bshad pa yin te /
T02D2663b-2:37b-26: tshig thams cad yi ge aa las ma gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:37b-27: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par ji ltar shes she na /
T02D2663b-2:37b-28: chos thams cad ni aa zhes bya ba'i sgo nas 'jug go zhes gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:37b-29: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D2663b-2:37b-30: yi ge aa zhes bya bas rgyu byas pa las
T02D2663b-2:37b-31: rtogs pa'i chos dang lung gi chos thams cad 'byung
T02D2663b-2:37b-32: ba'i phyir ro // de ltar yi ge aa zhes
T02D2663b-2:37b-33: bya ba de sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed cing
T02D2663b-2:37b-34: chos thams cad 'byung ba'i sgo yin pa de lta
T02D2663b-2:37b-35: bas na sngags la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-2:37b-36: rnams kyi yi ge aa de de bzhin gshegs par
T02D2663b-2:37b-37: blta ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:37b-38: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'dod
T02D2663b-2:37b-39: bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying po 'di
T02D2663b-2:37b-40: la brtson par bya'o zhes sbyar te /
T02D2663b-2:38a-0: yi ge aa zhes bya ba'i don ni de bzhin @38a * //
T02D2663b-2:38a-1: gshegs pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir
T02D2663b-2:38a-2: snying po byang chub nyid kyi snying po ste de
T02D2663b-2:38a-4: kun rdzob tu yang aa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i
T02D2663b-2:38a-5: 'bru de bsgoms na de'i mthus de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2663b-2:38a-6: grangs med pa 'char ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:38a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'dod pas kyang yi
T02D2663b-2:38a-8: ge 'di bsgom par bya la mchod pa yang sgrub
T02D2663b-2:38a-10: zad zing gi mchod pa rnam pa gnyis su rig par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:38a-11: de la sgrub pa'i mchod pa ni yi ge aa de nyid kyi don bsgoms par 'gyur la /
T02D2663b-2:38a-12: zang zing gi mchod pa ni yi ge aa de
T02D2663b-2:38a-13: bsgoms pa'i mthu las nam mkha' gang ba'i mchod pa
T02D2663b-2:38a-14: rgya chen po 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:38a-15: byang chub kyi sems mngon sum du bya bar 'dod
T02D2663b-2:38a-16: pa zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang
T02D2663b-2:38a-17: po yan chad kyi sems la bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:38a-18: de mngon du bya bar 'dod pas yi ge aa'i
T02D2663b-2:38a-19: don mngon par sgrub par byos shig ces pa'i don
T02D2663b-2:38a-20: to // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2663b-2:38a-21: byang chub kyi sems kyang ma skyes pa yin pas
T02D2663b-2:38a-22: yi ge aa'i don ma skyes pa dang mtshungs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:38a-23: phyir ro // byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs
T02D2663b-2:38a-24: par 'dod pa zhes pa ni de ltar 'dod pas
T02D2663b-2:38a-25: yi ge aa'i sgo sgoms shig ces 'don te /
T02D2663b-2:38a-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ma skyes pa'i don la dmigs /
T02D2663b-2:38a-27: yi ge aa yang ma skyes pa'i don yin pas
T02D2663b-2:38a-28: na spyod yul mthun pas lhan cig tu skye bar
T02D2663b-2:38a-29: 'gyur ro // de yan chad ni bsam gtan gyi sgo nas bsgom pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:38a-30: aa nyid sngags kyi sgo sgrub ba la zhugs pa
T02D2663b-2:38a-31: gnyis ka'i thun mong gi yon tan bstan pa yin
T02D2663b-2:38a-32: la dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:38a-33: sngags kyi sgo nas zhugs pa'i grub pa rab 'bring
T02D2663b-2:38a-35: de rnams ni yan lag gi tshig yin la /
T02D2663b-2:38a-36: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod
T02D2663b-2:38a-37: pas 'di sgoms shig ces bya ba ni bsdus pa'i
T02D2663b-2:38a-38: don yin no // de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i cho ga rnam bo gsum bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:38a-39: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par mdzad kyis snying
T02D2663b-2:38a-40: rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2663b-2:38a-41: rgyal po 'di'i cho ga dgod pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:38a-42: lha'i gnas gtan la dbab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:38a-43: de la snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba
T02D2663b-2:38b-0: zhes pa @38b ni lus kyi 'khor los byin gyis
T02D2663b-2:38b-2: ngag gi dkyil 'khor la yang ming du gdags so //
T02D2663b-2:38b-4: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum ka yang snying rje chen
T02D2663b-2:38b-5: po'i nus pa dang rgyus dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i phyir
T02D2663b-2:38b-7: lha'i gnas gtan la dbab pa zhes pa ni dbung
T02D2663b-2:38b-8: mtha' dang mchog du bkod pa'i lha bzhugs pa'i gnas
T02D2663b-2:38b-9: nges par bya'o // ting nge 'dzin rnam par sbrul
T02D2663b-2:38b-10: pa zhes bya ba ni gang ting nge 'dzin du
T02D2663b-2:38b-11: zhugs nas srung ba'i rig pa dang sngags la sogs
T02D2663b-2:38b-12: nges par bya'o // pa'o // gsang sngags spyod pa
T02D2663b-2:38b-13: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe las
T02D2663b-2:38b-15: bsam par bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na slob mas byang chub sems bsam pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:38b-16: slob dpon rang gi ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la sogs pa'i bye brag gsungs pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:38b-17: de dag so so'i bshad pa ni phyis 'chad par 'gyur ro//
T02D2663b-2:38b-18: de la dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga dgod pa zhes don bshad pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:38b-19: de la slob dpon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T02D2663b-2:38b-20: kyi sgo aa zhes bya ba la gnas te zhes
T02D2663b-2:38b-21: pa nas / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs snying po
T02D2663b-2:38b-22: nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2663b-2:38b-23: zhes pa'i bar du gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:38b-24: de la dkyil 'khor gyi thig bre ba'i tshe dkyil
T02D2663b-2:38b-25: 'khor gyi snam bu re re la yang slob dpon
T02D2663b-2:38b-26: kyi ting nge 'dzin re re gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:38b-27: phyi rol gyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor la byang chub
T02D2663b-2:38b-28: sems dpa' 'jam dpal la sogs pa pha rol tu
T02D2663b-2:38b-29: phyin pa las skyes pa rnams bzhugs pas na thig
T02D2663b-2:38b-30: bri ba'i slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang thams
T02D2663b-2:38b-31: cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu'i gnas kyi snying po yi ge
T02D2663b-2:38b-32: aa la gnas te dkyil 'khor gyi srad bu bres
T02D2663b-2:38b-33: shig ces gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:38b-34: de la dang po thig bri ba'i tshe dang por
T02D2663b-2:38b-35: nam mkha'i thig bri bar gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:38b-36: thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas zhes pa nas byang
T02D2663b-2:38b-37: phyogs su kha bltas nas srad du bres te zhes
T02D2663b-2:38b-39: de nas sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig bri ba'i phyir //
T02D2663b-2:38b-40: nub phyogs su kha bltas la bsgyur te thig gdab po zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:39a-0: lhag ma rnams 'dir ma gsungs pa i snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor du @39a * //
T02D2663b-2:39a-1: thig bri ba zhib tu bshad zin pas 'dir yang
T02D2663b-2:39a-2: lhag ma rnams de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o
T02D2663b-2:39a-3: // de nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig bri
T02D2663b-2:39a-4: ba'i slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin bshad pa'i phyir
T02D2663b-2:39a-5: // / de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' lag na rdo rjer de'i phyag rgya'am /
T02D2663b-2:39a-6: yi ge ba zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te
T02D2663b-2:39a-7: nang du zhugs la snying po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar
T02D2663b-2:39a-9: de'i slob dpon gyi ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub
T02D2663b-2:39a-10: ba'i sa bon yi ge aas bskyed pa'i rdo rje
T02D2663b-2:39a-11: sems dpar slob dpon bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa'o
T02D2663b-2:39a-12: // rdo rje sems dpa' la yang las kyi rdo
T02D2663b-2:39a-13: rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhin du 'dren pa
T02D2663b-2:39a-14: // yang yod de / skabs 'dir ni gzhan la
T02D2663b-2:39a-15: mi bya'i rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje
T02D2663b-2:39a-16: // yang yod de / la bya'o // de nas
T02D2663b-2:39a-17: dkyil 'khor bar ma'i snam bu'i thig bri ba'i ting
T02D2663b-2:39a-19: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la yang zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:39a-20: snying po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs la zhes pa'i bar du gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:39a-21: de la dkyil 'khor snam bu bar ma'i nang na
T02D2663b-2:39a-22: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang sprul ba'i sku gnyis
T02D2663b-2:39a-23: bzhugs pas dkyil 'khor de'i thig bri ba'i tshe'ang sku
T02D2663b-2:39a-24: de gnyis kyi rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bzhi
T02D2663b-2:39a-25: slob dpon byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2663b-2:39a-26: slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin de rnams dmigs nas bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-2:39a-27: de nas gzod ma nas zhi ba ni byang chub pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:39a-28: gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis gzugs ni spyod pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:39a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs ni kun du sangs rgyas pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:39a-30: snying po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:39a-31: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed cing zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:39a-32: lha'i gnas bsham par bya'o zhes pa'i bar gyis de'i
T02D2663b-2:39a-33: rgyud nas bshad pa gnas gtan la phab pa yin
T02D2663b-2:39a-35: de la snam bu gcig las kyang gsum du bgos te /
T02D2663b-2:39a-36: sum cha la 'khor sa bya zhing sum gnyis la lha'i gzugs bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-2:39a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed cing
T02D2663b-2:39a-38: srad du bres la zhes pas de ltar lha'i gnas
T02D2663b-2:39a-39: dang 'khor sa dgod pa gya tshom du mi bya
T02D2663b-2:39b-0: bar thig @39b btab ste bya bas de nyid kyi
T02D2663b-2:39b-1: tshe na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa stong
T02D2663b-2:39b-2: pa nyid la dmigs par bya'o zhes pa'i don to
T02D2663b-2:39b-3: // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshon rtsi rnams byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:39b-4: de nas yang bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2663b-2:39b-5: snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2663b-2:39b-6: zhes pa nas / bdud sde sdang ba thams cad la //
T02D2663b-2:39b-7: rnam pa kun du bsdigs par byed //
T02D2663b-2:39b-8: ces pa'i bar du gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2663b-2:39b-9: de la bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
T02D2663b-2:39b-10: mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la zhes
T02D2663b-2:39b-11: pa ni tshon rnams byin gyis rlob pa'i tshe rdo
T02D2663b-2:39b-12: rje'i phyag rgyas slob dpon nyid rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663b-2:39b-13: kyi skur byin gyis rlobs shig ces pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:39b-14: rdo rje ni ye shes kyi mtshan ma yin pas
T02D2663b-2:39b-15: na ye shes lngas byin gyis brlabs pa'i don to
T02D2663b-2:39b-16: // tshon rnams byin gyis brlab pa yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663b-2:39b-17: de la don dam par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /

T02D2663b-2:42b-13: ngan las 'das pa zhi ba thob par byed pa
T02D2663b-2:42b-16: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2663b-2:42b-17: mi shigs rdo rje'i gdan yin te //
T02D2663b-2:42b-19: rgyal bsras bcas thams cad ni //
T02D2663b-2:42b-21: zhes pa ni padma'i phyag rgya de /
T02D2663b-2:42b-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gdan yin te //
T02D2663b-2:42b-23: mgon po sangs rgyas rnams gang du byang chub pa
T02D2663b-2:42b-24: na yang gdan 'di la bzhugs te byang chub la
T02D2663b-2:42b-25: / sangs rgyas kyi sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang padmo 'di las skyes zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:42b-26: phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgya //
T02D2663b-2:42b-27: mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa ste //
T02D2663b-2:42b-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'di //
T02D2663b-2:42b-29: nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te bstan //
T02D2663b-2:42b-30: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi de ma thag
T02D2663b-2:42b-31: pa'i lam gyi ye shes de rdo rje'i phyag rgyar
T02D2663b-2:42b-33: mi shes pa'i grong khyer 'jig pa ni ye shes
T02D2663b-2:42b-34: des sems las byung ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i ma
T02D2663b-2:42b-36: gtsug tor phyag rgya chen po ste //
T02D2663b-2:42b-37: gtsug tor zhes ni bsgrags pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:42b-38: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D2663b-2:42b-39: rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2663b-2:42b-40: zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi skyes bu chen
T02D2663b-2:42b-41: po'i mtshan gtsug tor de phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs
T02D2663b-2:42b-42: pa ste / 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D2663b-2:42b-43: rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2663b-2:42b-44: zhes pa ni phyag rgya la ni mang po bsdus
T02D2663b-2:42b-45: pa las lha'i gzugs su 'gyur la gcig pus lha'i
T02D2663b-2:42b-46: gzugs su gyur pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya
T02D2663b-2:43a-1: bcings pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur du rung zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:43a-2: rgyal ba dam pas phyag rgya 'di //
T02D2663b-2:43a-3: mdzod spu zhes ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02D2663b-2:43a-4: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su //
T02D2663b-2:43a-5: rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2663b-2:43a-6: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi skyes bu chen po'i
T02D2663b-2:43a-7: mtshan smin mtshams nas mdzod spu zhes bya ba spu'i
T02D2663b-2:43a-8: nyag ma gcig gis brkyang na ni khams gsum thams
T02D2663b-2:43a-9: cad du yang khyab par 'gyur la bskyil na de
T02D2663b-2:43a-10: nyid du zad pa de phyag rgya 'dir byin gyis
T02D2663b-2:43a-11: brlabs pa ste / 'di 'ba' zhig bcings pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur du rung zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:43a-12: lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya ni tshigs su bcad pa nyid kyis gsal bar gsungs so //
T02D2663b-2:43a-13: sems can kun la mi 'jigs pa //
T02D2663b-2:43a-14: de yis rab tu sbyin par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:43a-15: gang gi rgya chen de bcings na //
T02D2663b-2:43a-16: mi 'jigs phyag rgya zhes bsgrags so //
T02D2663b-2:43a-17: zhes pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2663b-2:43a-18: bdag gam sems can rnams bgegs la sogs pas skrag
T02D2663b-2:43a-19: cing 'jigs par gyur na phyag rgya bcings te bstan
T02D2663b-2:43a-20: pas de las thar bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:43a-21: 'di ni dam pa byin rgya zhes //
T02D2663b-2:43a-22: 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyi sgra //
T02D2663b-2:43a-23: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su //
T02D2663b-2:43a-24: rgyal mchog dam pa stsol bar byed //
T02D2663b-2:43a-25: ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams
T02D2663b-2:43a-26: la mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste nam grub pa
T02D2663b-2:43a-27: la sogs pa'i mchog 'dod na mchog sbyin pa'i phyag
T02D2663b-2:43a-29: phyag rgya chen po rgya chen 'dis //
T02D2663b-2:43a-30: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2663b-2:43a-31: bdud ni rnam par bsdigs zhes bya //
T02D2663b-2:43a-32: phung byed thams cad 'jigs par byed //
T02D2663b-2:43a-33: 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su //
T02D2663b-2:43a-34: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad dang //
T02D2663b-2:43a-35: gegs dang log 'dren gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2663b-2:43a-36: the tshom med par rab tu 'byer //
T02D2663b-2:43a-37: zhes pa ni gegs rnam par bskrad pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2663b-2:43a-38: ste bcings pa tsam gyis gegs la sogs pa thams
T02D2663b-2:43a-39: cad rnam par skrag nas so sor 'byer bar 'gyur
T02D2663b-2:43a-40: te / de ltar gegs rnams so sor byer na
T02D2663b-2:43a-41: gegs med pas ji ltar bsams pa'i don grub par
T02D2663b-2:43a-42: 'gyur bas na re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs
T02D2663b-2:43a-43: te / par byed pa'o // 'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams gyi //
T02D2663b-2:43a-44: thugs rje las byung sbyan yin te//
T02D2663b-2:43b-0: @43b mig gi steng du mkhas pas bzhag / de las sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:43b-1: zhes pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying rje
T02D2663b-2:43b-2: chen po'i dbang gis shes rab kyi spyan sems can
T02D2663b-2:43b-3: thams cad la gzigs pa ni snying rje las byung
T02D2663b-2:43b-5: spyan de phyag rgya 'dir byin gyis brlabs bas na
T02D2663b-2:43b-6: phyag rgya 'di bcings te mig tu gzhag na bdag
T02D2663b-2:43b-7: sangs rgyas kyi skur bsgyur ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2663b-2:43b-9: 'di ni zhags pa mchog ces grags //
T02D2663b-2:43b-10: sdang ba thams cad 'jig par byed //
T02D2663b-2:43b-11: sngags pas 'di bcings de yi tshe //
T02D2663b-2:43b-12: rtag tu sdang ba bcings par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:43b-13: zhes pa ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad
T02D2663b-2:43b-14: kyi rang bzhin gyi ye shes sems can thams cad
T02D2663b-2:43b-15: 'don par byed pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyar byin gyis
T02D2663b-2:43b-16: brlabs te / zhags pa'i phyag rgya 'di bcing pas
T02D2663b-2:43b-17: bgegs la sogs pa'i gnod pa rnams 'ching ba'i las
T02D2663b-2:43b-19: sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2663b-2:43b-20: lcags kyu zhes ni 'di bshad de //
T02D2663b-2:43b-21: byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che //
T02D2663b-2:43b-22: sa bcu dag la gnas pa dang //
T02D2663b-2:43b-23: sdang bar sems pa gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2663b-2:43b-24: sangs rgyas rab tu 'gugs par byed //
T02D2663b-2:43b-25: ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu dang 'bras
T02D2663b-2:43b-26: bu'i spyod pa rnams las rgyu'i tshe na bsdu ba
T02D2663b-2:43b-27: rnam pa bzhis sems can rnams sdud cing 'dren pa
T02D2663b-2:43b-28: dang / 'bras bu'i tshe sku mi zad pa la
T02D2663b-2:43b-29: sogs pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan gyis sems can rnams sdud
T02D2663b-2:43b-30: cing 'dren pa'i spyod pa de dag nyid lcags kyus
T02D2663b-2:43b-31: phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:43b-32: lcags kyus kyang bgegs la sogs pa gnod par byed
T02D2663b-2:43b-33: pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la
T02D2663b-2:43b-34: gnas pa yang ste thams cad 'dren par byed de
T02D2663b-2:43b-35: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa yang
T02D2663b-2:43b-36: 'gugs na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-2:43b-37: // de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya la
T02D2663b-2:43b-38: phyag rgya de nyid las zhes pa ni lcags kyu'i
T02D2663b-2:43b-39: phyag rgyal snyegs te lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las srin
T02D2663b-2:43b-40: lag gnyis bsgreng par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:43b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni mngon par byang chub pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663b-2:43b-42: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni spyod pa dang spyar ro //
T02D2663b-2:44a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi phyag rgya dang stobs bcu'i phyag @44a * //
T02D2663b-2:44a-1: rgya ni kun du sangs rgyas pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663b-2:44a-2: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtog par byed
T02D2663b-2:44a-3: pa'i phyag rgya ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang
T02D2663b-2:44a-4: sbyar ro // de la sngags kyang /
T02D2663b-2:44a-6: zhes pa nam kun du sangs rgyas pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663b-2:44a-7: nam:sa manta badzr'a n'am zhes pa ni byang chub dang sbyor ro //
T02D2663b-2:44a-8: nam:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang sbyar ro //
T02D2663b-2:44a-9: de la sngags dang phyag rgya rnams bstan pa yang sbyir bstan pa dang so sor bstan pa de /
T02D2663b-2:44a-10: de la so sor bstan pa yang rnam pa gnyis te dngos su bstan pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:44a-12: de la dngos su bstan pa ni gong du ming smos pa rnams so //
T02D2663b-2:44a-13: gzhan du snyeg pa ni de lta bu la sogs pa zhes pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:44a-15: sbyir bstan pa ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po'o na
T02D2663b-2:44a-16: kyang ji tsam du yan lag bskyod pa de dag
T02D2663b-2:44a-17: kun phyag rgya rgyas par rig par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:44a-18: ji tsam du lce bskyod pa de dag kun kyang
T02D2663b-2:44a-19: gsang sngags bstan pa rig par bya'o zhes pa ste
T02D2663b-2:44a-20: / de yang ji lta bur gnas nas she na //
T02D2663b-2:44a-21: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de
T02D2663b-2:44a-22: bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas te dkyil 'khor bri
T02D2663b-2:44a-24: nam sngags pa byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid dang /
T02D2663b-2:44a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas par gyur na
T02D2663b-2:44a-26: ji tsam du yan lag la sogs pa bskyod pa
T02D2663b-2:44a-27: de tsam du phyag rgyar 'gyur ji tsam du lce
T02D2663b-2:44a-28: bskyod pa de tsam du sngags spyod par 'gyur ro
T02D2663b-2:44a-30: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid ces pa
T02D2663b-2:44a-31: ni stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan
T02D2663b-2:44a-32: pa zhes bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la
T02D2663b-2:44a-33: gnas zhes pa ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa
T02D2663b-2:44a-35: kun rdzob tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas pa ni lha'i gzugs su sbyar ba'o //
T02D2663b-2:44a-36: don dam pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi lhar sbyar ba ste /
T02D2663b-2:44a-37: de ltar yang byang chub kyi sems dang ldan zhing
T02D2663b-2:44a-38: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid lha'i gzugs
T02D2663b-2:44a-39: su sbyar ba ma yin par sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D2663b-2:44a-40: bya ba'am / dkyil 'khor bris na sangs rgyas dang
T02D2663b-2:44a-41: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis srung bar mi 'gyur
T02D2663b-2:44b-0: ro zhes dngos su @44b gsungs so //
T02D2663b-2:44b-1: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2663b-2:44b-2: byang chub pa rnam par sbrul pa byin gyis rlob
T02D2663b-2:44b-3: pa las / phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o /
T02D2663b-2:44b-5: // / da ni sngags kyi le'u bshad pa la sogs pas sngags kyi tshig dang /
T02D2663b-2:44b-6: yi ge'i 'bru las ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:44b-7: yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D2663b-2:44b-8: rnams aa la sogs pa bcu drug dang ldan par
T02D2663b-2:44b-10: de la yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu
T02D2663b-2:44b-11: rtsa gnyis po rnams ni yi ge aa dang mi
T02D2663b-2:44b-12: smra ste / de thams cad kyang aa dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:44b-13: de yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po thams cad du
T02D2663b-2:44b-14: 'jug pa'i chos kyi sgo chos kyi rnam grangs nyon
T02D2663b-2:44b-15: cig ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:44b-16: thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo zhes pa ni aa
T02D2663b-2:44b-17: dang ldan pa'i yi ge rnams sngags la sbyar ba
T02D2663b-2:44b-18: dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa thams cad du khyab par 'jug pa'i sgo'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:44b-19: de bas na gsang ba'i bdag po de la byang
T02D2663b-2:44b-20: chub sems dpas aa zhes bya ba la gnas te
T02D2663b-2:44b-21: / dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:44b-22: dang po aa dang sa dang bste gsum smos pa ni rigs gsum smos pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:44b-23: de dang por yi ge aa tha mal bar smos
T02D2663b-2:44b-24: nas ka la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis pa
T02D2663b-2:44b-25: ma smos pa ni ka la sogs pa rnam pa
T02D2663b-2:44b-26: thams cad kyang tha ma la pa'i rang bzhin du
T02D2663b-2:44b-28: de dag thams cad byang chub kyi rang bzhin du bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:44b-29: yi ge aa 'dren pa thog mar smos nas ka
T02D2663b-2:44b-30: la sogs pa thams cad kyang ring por smos pa
T02D2663b-2:44b-31: rnams ni de dag thams cad sbyod pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2663b-2:44b-33: yi ge aam thog mar smos nas kam zhes pa
T02D2663b-2:44b-34: la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis smos pa thams
T02D2663b-2:44b-35: cad kyang aam dang ldan pas kun du sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:44b-36: pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:44b-37: yi ge aa cho ga gnyis dang ldan pa thog
T02D2663b-2:44b-38: mar smos na ka la sogs pa thams cad aa
T02D2663b-2:44b-39: tsheg gnyis dang ldan pa ni thams cad kyang mya
T02D2663b-2:44b-40: ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o
T02D2663b-2:44b-41: // ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu rtsa
T02D2663b-2:44b-42: gnyis po de rnams ai la sogs pa dang ldan
T02D2663b-2:44b-43: pa na yang ting nge 'dzin de dag nyid kyi
T02D2663b-2:45a-1: rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:45a-2: de la ri r'i dang li l'i gnyis ma smos
T02D2663b-2:45a-3: pa ni gong du yi ge ra dang ai la
T02D2663b-2:45a-4: sogs par ldan pa ri r'i zhes pa'i khongs su
T02D2663b-2:45a-5: 'dus la / la dang ai la sogs par ldan
T02D2663b-2:45a-6: pa li l'i zhes pa de'i khongs su 'dus par
T02D2663b-2:45a-7: 'dus la / shes par bya'o // gsang ba pa'i
T02D2663b-2:45a-8: bdag po de ltar na 'di ni yi ge'i tshul
T02D2663b-2:45a-9: la mkhas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te zhes pa
T02D2663b-2:45a-10: nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas ni sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:45a-11: kyi zhing rab 'byams gang dag na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-2:45a-12: pa rnams thams cad du 'dug pa'i chos kyi rnam
T02D2663b-2:45a-13: grangs 'di mi 'chad pa mthong ngo zhes pa'i bar
T02D2663b-2:45a-14: ni bshad pa'i yi ge rnams kyi rjes su bsngags
T02D2663b-2:45a-16: rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:45a-17: lus phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:45a-18: byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:45a-19: mthu phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:45a-20: de lha rang bzhin phun sum tshogs pa ni yi
T02D2663b-2:45a-21: ge'i rang bzhin rnams so sor bstan pa ste yi
T02D2663b-2:45a-22: ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te
T02D2663b-2:45a-24: lus phun sum tshogs pa ni gsang sngags kyi tshul la mkhas pa'i cho ga zhes pa'i tshig go //
T02D2663b-2:45a-25: byin rlabs phun sum tshogs pa ni nam yi ge'i sngags rnams kyi sgrar brjod dam /
T02D2663b-2:45a-27: lha'i gzugs su sbyor bas na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis rlob pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:45a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
T02D2663b-2:45a-29: kyis byin du brlabs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:45a-30: tshig gis so // mthu phun sum tshogs pa ni 'das pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:45a-32: ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang bshad ces pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:45a-33: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi chad pa ma mthong ngo zhes pa'i bar gyi tshig gis so //
T02D2663b-2:45a-34: byin gyi rlabs phun sum tshogs pa la las rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2663b-2:45a-35: sngags rnams su sbyor ba dang /
T02D2663b-2:45a-36: lha'i gzugs su sbyor ba dang /
T02D2663b-2:45a-37: ting nge 'dzin du sbyor ba dang spyod pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:45a-38: de la sngags rnams su sbyor ba ni yi ge'i
T02D2663b-2:45a-39: 'bru de rnams las sngags kyi tshig gi tshul du
T02D2663b-2:45a-40: sbyar ba ste / gsang sngags kyi tshul la mkhas
T02D2663b-2:45a-41: pa'i cho ga zhes pa'i tshig snga ma nyid kyis
T02D2663b-2:45a-42: sbyar ba ste / so // lha'i gzugs su sbyor
T02D2663b-2:45b-0: ba ni yi ge rnams @45b gang rung pa las
T02D2663b-2:45b-1: lha'i gzugs su sbyor ba ste /
T02D2663b-2:45b-2: lha yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D2663b-2:45b-3: ting nge 'dzin du sbyor ba ni yi ge 'bru
T02D2663b-2:45b-4: de rnams la stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin chos
T02D2663b-2:45b-6: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul la mkhas pa zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D2663b-2:45b-7: sbyod pa zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:45b-8: las dang rab 'bring la sogs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub

T02D2663b-2:51a-33: bya'o zhes pa'o // so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis //
T02D2663b-2:51a-34: tshul zhes pas ni ci rigs par //
T02D2663b-2:51a-35: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i rim pas sngon du
T02D2663b-2:51a-36: bsnyen pa byas nas bdag dang gnas dang slob ma
T02D2663b-2:51a-37: srung ba la sogs pa'i sngags rnams ji ltar rigs
T02D2663b-2:51a-38: par sbyor ro zhes pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:51a-39: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sngon du bsnyen pa bya
T02D2663b-2:51a-40: ba yang dkyil 'khor gsum ga dang 'brel par shes
T02D2663b-2:51a-41: par bya'o // gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:51b-0: @51b rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur //
T02D2663b-2:51b-1: zhes pa'i bar gyis slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang bye brag bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:51b-2: de yang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang bye brag bshad pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:51b-3: de la spyi'i mtshan nyid ni yid byang chub kyi sems la zhugs pa zhes pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:51b-4: theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa la sogs pas sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-2:51b-5: 'dir ni zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:51b-6: dmigs pa can gyi bye brag bshad pa ste //
T02D2663b-2:51b-8: zab dang mi zab bye brag las //
T02D2663b-2:51b-9: de yi mtshan nyid shes par bya //
T02D2663b-2:51b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2663b-2:51b-11: gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pa'i //
T02D2663b-2:51b-12: zhes pa ni slob dpon nyid kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D2663b-2:51b-13: phyag rgya dang sngags rnams gzhung las ji skad bshad pa bzhin shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:51b-14: zab mo rgya cher shes par bya //
T02D2663b-2:51b-16: mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs //
T02D2663b-2:51b-17: zhes pa'i bar ni zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa'i slob dpon gyi bye brag ste /
T02D2663b-2:51b-18: zab mo ni stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa
T02D2663b-2:51b-19: la mos pas de'i sems kyi rgyud sus kyang rig
T02D2663b-2:51b-20: par mi nus te dpag par dka' zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:51b-21: rgya che ba ni don dam par chos thams cad
T02D2663b-2:51b-22: stong pa nyid nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bur rtogs
T02D2663b-2:51b-23: la kun rdzob tu yang sgyu ma dang smig rgyu
T02D2663b-2:51b-24: lta bur shes nas tshod pa la sogs pa rgya
T02D2663b-2:51b-26: lus can rnams ni yid mi rton //
T02D2663b-2:51b-27: zhes pa ni lus can rnams dang spyod lam mi mthun pas gcig la gcig yid mi rton pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:51b-28: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog ste //
T02D2663b-2:51b-29: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir te //
T02D2663b-2:51b-30: 'jig rten na yang pa'i spyod pa dang mi 'gal bar spyod pa ni be'u mchog ces bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:51b-31: mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs //
T02D2663b-2:51b-32: zhes pa ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi chos rnams la ma chags pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:51b-33: gnyis pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis //
T02D2663b-2:51b-35: rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur /
T02D2663b-2:51b-36: zhes pa'i bar slob dpon dmigs pa can gyi bye brag ste /
T02D2663b-2:51b-38: myos par 'gyur ba dmigs pa can //
T02D2663b-2:51b-39: zhes pa ni thos pa dang bsam pa'i shes rab
T02D2663b-2:51b-40: kyis sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa thos shing bsam
T02D2663b-2:52a-0: pa'i shes rab kyis stong pa'i rang @52a * //
T02D2663b-2:52a-1: bzhin du mos su zin kyang bsgom pa'i shes rab
T02D2663b-2:52a-2: kyis goms par nus pas phyi rol gyi spyod pa
T02D2663b-2:52a-4: des 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor tshon la sogs pas
T02D2663b-2:52a-5: bri bar bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur zhing lung
T02D2663b-2:52a-7: 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor ni tshon la sogs pas
T02D2663b-2:52a-8: bris nas 'jig rten pa rnams kyi lta ba'i spyod
T02D2663b-2:52a-9: yul du gyur pas 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes
T02D2663b-2:52a-10: bya'i mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2663b-2:52a-11: ni mi bya'o // de bas na slob dpon dmigs
T02D2663b-2:52a-12: pa can gyis phyi rol gyi tshon la sogs pas
T02D2663b-2:52a-13: dkyil 'khor bri bar dbang bskur gyi //
T02D2663b-2:52a-14: sems dbang du ma gyur pas yid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar ni dbang mi bskur ro //
T02D2663b-2:52a-15: zab cing rgya che ba la mos pa'i slob dpon
T02D2663b-2:52a-16: de ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-2:52a-17: gnyis ka bri bar dang bskur te /
T02D2663b-2:52a-18: phyi rol gyi spyod pa rnams la ma chags shing
T02D2663b-2:52a-19: sems dbang du gyur pas nang gi dkyil 'khor bri
T02D2663b-2:52a-21: slob ma rnams kyi yid dang sbyar ba'i phyir phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor yang bri bar gsungs so //
T02D2663b-2:52a-22: dus dang dus min bye brag las //
T02D2663b-2:52a-24: slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog / ces bya ba'i bar gyis slob ma'i bye brag bshad de /
T02D2663b-2:52a-25: dus dang dus min bye brag las //
T02D2663b-2:52a-26: zhes pa las sbyir slob ma rnam pa bzhi las
T02D2663b-2:52a-27: slob ma kha cig sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:52a-29: byang chub kyi sems kyang bsgoms pa ni dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-2:52a-30: du bcug pa nyid kyi tshe na sgrub par dbang
T02D2663b-2:52a-31: bskur la slob dpon dmigs pa can gyis mtshan nyid
T02D2663b-2:52a-32: dang ldan na byang chub sems dang mi ldan yang
T02D2663b-2:52a-33: de nyid kyi tshe na slob dpon du dbang bskur
T02D2663b-2:52a-34: bar bya ste / de dag ni /
T02D2663b-2:52a-35: gcig ni de yi mod la bsgrub //
T02D2663b-2:52a-37: gzhan ni sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa thos shing
T02D2663b-2:52a-38: shes kyang byang chub kyi sems ma bsgoms na sgrub
T02D2663b-2:52a-39: par dbang bskur du mi rung ste /
T02D2663b-2:52a-40: dkyil 'khor der bcug nas byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa'i thabs bstan te /
T02D2663b-2:52a-41: byang chub kyi sems goms par gyur pa ni phyis
T02D2663b-2:52a-42: bsgrub par bya ba ni dus gnyis par bsgrub pa'o
T02D2663b-2:52a-43: // de bzhin du slob dpon dbang bskur ba don
T02D2663b-2:52a-44: du gnyer na yang sngags kyi rgyud la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:52b-0: mi shes na der dbang mi bskur bar sngags @52b
T02D2663b-2:52b-1: kyi rgyud la sogs pa rdzogs par slob tu bcug
T02D2663b-2:52b-2: ste slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa na
T02D2663b-2:52b-3: slob dpon du dbang bskur ba yang dus gnyis par
T02D2663b-2:52b-4: // bsgrub pa'o // de la kha cig snga nas
T02D2663b-2:52b-5: kyang rgyud la sogs pa mi shes shing byang chub
T02D2663b-2:52b-6: kyi sems kyang ma bsgoms phyis kyang mi slob la
T02D2663b-2:52b-7: bsgom par mi 'gyur ba ni dkyil 'khor du gzung
T02D2663b-2:52b-8: ba tsam las dus gnyis par yang slob dpon du
T02D2663b-2:52b-9: sgrub par dbang mi bskur bar ni gnyis kar min
T02D2663b-2:52b-10: // bsgrub pa'o // zhes pa'o // mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2663b-2:52b-11: slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog / cas pa ni /
T02D2663b-2:52b-12: rgyud la sogs pa yang rdzogs par shes //
T02D2663b-2:52b-13: byang chub sems kyang tshul bzhin du bsgom pa zhig
T02D2663b-2:52b-14: gis bsod nams spel ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du zhugs
T02D2663b-2:52b-15: pa de yang slob ma'i grangs su yang gtogs te
T02D2663b-2:52b-16: / de ni dbang la sogs pa bskur bas //
T02D2663b-2:52b-17: 'dir dbang la sogs pa gdod bskur mi dgos te /
T02D2663b-2:52b-19: mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yis //
T02D2663b-2:52b-21: sa ni dang por shes bya ba //
T02D2663b-2:52b-23: de bas rtog pa rnam spangs nas //
T02D2663b-2:52b-24: sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya //
T02D2663b-2:52b-25: zhes pa'i bar gyis sa sbyang ba bshad de /
T02D2663b-2:52b-26: phyi nang gi rnam pa gnyis las //
T02D2663b-2:52b-27: phyi'i sa sbyang ba ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-2:52b-28: 'dir nang gi sa sbyang ba bshad de //
T02D2663b-2:52b-29: sems kyi sar ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:52b-31: spyad pa sngar ni bstan pa ste //
T02D2663b-2:52b-32: zhes pa ni sngar byang chub kyi sems ni rang
T02D2663b-2:52b-33: gi sems yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2663b-2:52b-37: dbyibs su 'am zhes pa nas rnam pa thams cad
T02D2663b-2:52b-38: kyi bar du yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs pa
T02D2663b-2:52b-39: yin te zhes pa la sogs pa'i bar du bshad
T02D2663b-2:52b-40: pa de'i tshul du ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang
T02D2663b-2:52b-41: / rnam pa thams cad spangs pa dang //
T02D2663b-2:52b-42: rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas na //
T02D2663b-2:52b-43: sems kyi dri ma dag pa ste //
T02D2663b-2:52b-44: de ltar dag par byas nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ram /
T02D2663b-2:52b-45: nang gi dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba bri bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:52b-46: de yis de ni yongs su spangs //
T02D2663b-2:52b-47: zhes pa ni sngar byang chub kyi sems sbyang bar
T02D2663b-2:52b-48: bshad par des sems kyi sbyang bar bya'o zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-2:52b-49: // nam zhi nye pa dang bral nas //
T02D2663b-2:53a-0: zhes pa ni ji ltar phyi rol gyi sa'i @53a * //
T02D2663b-2:53a-1: nyes par rus pa dang rdo ba la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:53a-2: med pa bzhin du 'dir yang rnam par rtog pa
T02D2663b-2:53a-4: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang
T02D2663b-2:53a-5: bral na bgegs la sogs pa sa mi 'jigs zhes
T02D2663b-2:53a-7: de tshe de ni dag pa ste //
T02D2663b-2:53a-8: nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D2663b-2:53a-9: mngon par byang chub mthong bas na //
T02D2663b-2:53a-10: de ltar de ni bstan zhes bya //
T02D2663b-2:53a-12: de las gzhan dus spyod pa //
T02D2663b-2:53a-14: byang chub sems kyis spyang bya //
T02D2663b-2:53a-15: zhes pa'i bar gyis phyi rol gyi sa rnams sa
T02D2663b-2:53a-16: sbyangs pa na yang byang chub kyi sems dang mi
T02D2663b-2:53a-17: ldan par rtog pa la gnas te /
T02D2663b-2:53a-19: de las gzhan du zhes pa gang gi nang du
T02D2663b-2:53a-20: spyang ba las gzhan pa ste phyi'i sa la bya'o
T02D2663b-2:53a-21: // sngags pa rtog pa la gnas nas su //
T02D2663b-2:53a-22: zhes pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i dngos po yod par rtog ste /
T02D2663b-2:53a-23: sbyang bar bya ba'i sa dang //
T02D2663b-2:53a-24: rus pa la sogs pa'i nyes pa yang dngos po
T02D2663b-2:53a-25: yod par rtog cing sa de spyod na de byang
T02D2663b-2:53a-26: chub kyi sems dang mi ldan pas de dag par
T02D2663b-2:53a-27: 'gyur ba ma yin zhes pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:53a-28: de bas rtog pa rnam spangs nas //
T02D2663b-2:53a-29: sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya //
T02D2663b-2:53a-30: da yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni //
T02D2663b-2:53a-31: cho ga rgyas par gang bstan pa //
T02D2663b-2:53a-32: de dag thog mar bstan pa ni //
T02D2663b-2:53a-33: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2663b-2:53a-34: byang chub kyi sems sngon du bsgom pa yang slob
T02D2663b-2:53a-35: dpon gyi mtshan nyid mang pa las shes rab kyi
T02D2663b-2:53a-36: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la rtag tu mkhas
T02D2663b-2:53a-37: pa theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa zhes
T02D2663b-2:53a-38: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:53a-39: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la
T02D2663b-2:53a-40: mkhas pa ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin la
T02D2663b-2:53a-41: mkhas par mngon par sngon du byang chub kyi sems
T02D2663b-2:53a-43: theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pas kyang stong pa nyid la mkhas par mngon te /
T02D2663b-2:53a-44: gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i khyad par la mkhas pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:53a-45: dkyil 'khor gyi las 'di rnams thams cad kyang bya
T02D2663b-2:53a-46: ba byas pa'i slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid de lta
T02D2663b-2:53a-47: bu dang ldan pas sa sbyang bar bya bas na
T02D2663b-2:53a-48: rtog pa 'ba' zhig la mi gnas gyi /
T02D2663b-2:53b-0: @53b byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pas 'jig rten pa rnams kyi sems dang sbyar ba'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:53b-1: phyi rol gyi sa rnams sbyang ba rgya cher bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das gyi dgongs pa de /
T02D2663b-2:53b-2: rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes te //
T02D2663b-2:53b-3: gang gis de lta bu'i rtog pa ma spangs pa
T02D2663b-2:53b-4: de ni sangs rgyas dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyur
T02D2663b-2:53b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs la /
T02D2663b-2:53b-8: slob ma rnams la nan tan du //
T02D2663b-2:53b-9: byang chub sems kyi sbyang ba ste //
T02D2663b-2:53b-10: de yang smon pa byang chub kyi sems dang /
T02D2663b-2:53b-11: 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems sbyang ba gnyis 'jug
T02D2663b-2:53b-12: pa byang chub kyi sems sngar bsgoms na de sbyangs
T02D2663b-2:53b-13: pa yin pas phyis dkyil 'khor du 'jug kar smon
T02D2663b-2:53b-14: pa byang chub kyi sems sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:53b-15: gnyis po de dag sa sbyang ba'o //
T02D2663b-2:53b-16: de ste sngar 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems goms
T02D2663b-2:53b-17: par ma byas na dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshe
T02D2663b-2:53b-18: smon pa byang chub kyi sems sbyin la /
T02D2663b-2:53b-19: phyis 'ug pa byang chub kyi sems bsgom du gzhug
T02D2663b-2:53b-20: ste de ni slob ma rnams kyi byang chub kyi
T02D2663b-2:53b-22: srung ba mi g-yo mgon po 'am //
T02D2663b-2:53b-23: khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bya //
T02D2663b-2:53b-24: zhes pa ni slob ma rnams kyi srung ba gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:53b-25: slob ma rnams thog ma nang du 'ong ba'i tshe srung ba dang /
T02D2663b-2:53b-26: lhag par gnas pa'i tshe srung ba la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:53b-27: thams cad gnyis po 'di dag gang yang rung bas
T02D2663b-2:53b-29: slob ma nam zhig dmigs pa yis //
T02D2663b-2:53b-30: nam yang g-yos par mi 'gyur ba //
T02D2663b-2:53b-31: de tshe dri med na nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D2663b-2:53b-32: yang dag par ni dag par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:53b-33: zhes pas ni slob ma dag pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:53b-34: de yang nam slob ma de rnal 'byor la gnas pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:53b-35: rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang //
T02D2663b-2:53b-36: rnam pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D2663b-2:53b-37: dge ba dang mi dge ba gnyis ka la dmigs
T02D2663b-2:53b-38: pas mi g-yos pa dang rnal 'byor las langs nas
T02D2663b-2:53b-39: kyang mchod pa la sogs pa'i dge ba ni spyod
T02D2663b-2:53b-40: kyi 'dod chags la sogs pa'i yul gyi dmigs pas
T02D2663b-2:53b-41: mi g-yo bar 'gyur na de dag pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2663b-2:53b-42: do zhes pa'o // de tshe dri med nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D2663b-2:54a-0: zhes pa ni ji ltar nam mkha' gang gis @54a * //
T02D2663b-2:54a-1: kyang ma bsdus pas rang bzhin gyis dang ba dang /
T02D2663b-2:54a-2: glo bur gyi sbrin la sogs pas chod na yang
T02D2663b-2:54a-3: nam mkha' de rang bzhin dag pa las nyams par
T02D2663b-2:54a-5: 'di yang ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshe dge
T02D2663b-2:54a-6: ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dri ma
T02D2663b-2:54a-8: ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i tshe mchod pa la
T02D2663b-2:54a-9: sogs pa'i spyod pa byed kyang sgyu ma la sogs
T02D2663b-2:54a-10: pa'i rang bzhin du shes bzhin du byed de /
T02D2663b-2:54a-11: dngos po yod par rtog pa'i dri mas mi gos pa'i phyir //
T02D2663b-2:54a-12: sa byin rlab pa dang po ni //
T02D2663b-2:54a-13: rdzogs sang rgyas kyis bya bar bshad //
T02D2663b-2:54a-14: gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te //

T02D2663b-2:54a-18: tshe dkyil 'khor gyis sbyang ba der sangs rgyas lnga
T02D2663b-2:54a-19: bsam pa la sogs pa gsungs pa de nyid 'dir
T02D2663b-2:54a-20: gleng nas rim pa bzhin du bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:54a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi sa de dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams der bsams nas byin gyis brlab /
T02D2663b-2:54a-22: de'i 'og tu sems kyis bdag gi bar gzung //
T02D2663b-2:54a-23: de'i 'og tu sngags kyis bsrung ba ste //
T02D2663b-2:54a-24: de gsum gyis yongs su gzung gi de las gzhan du ma yin zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:54a-25: srad bu rnam bzhi bshad de //
T02D2663b-2:54a-27: lnga pa nam mkha' lta bur bshad //
T02D2663b-2:54a-28: ces pa'i bar ni sngar tshon sna lnga'i srad bu
T02D2663b-2:54a-29: zhes sbyir bshad pa de tshon sna lnga gang yin
T02D2663b-2:54a-30: pa'i ming mos nas gsal bar bshad pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:54a-31: bar snang la ni bzung nas su //

T02D2663b-2:55a-5: byams pa dang snying rje ni nan tan gyi mchod pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:55a-6: phyi dang nang gi mchod pa gang yang rung ba

T02D2663b-2:57a-20: gyur pa ste / de dag las la la ni skyes par snang /

T02D2663b-2:57a-22: yang na kun du thams cad kyi //
T02D2663b-2:57a-23: kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams te //

T02D2663b-2:57a-25: dbyibs gru bzhi la sogs pa smos pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:57a-26: gzugs bud med dang skyes par smos pa de dag
T02D2663b-2:57a-27: nges pa ni ma yin te de dag kun kyang
T02D2663b-2:57a-28: kha dog thams cad dang dbyibs thams cad dang /
T02D2663b-2:57a-29: gzugs thams cad du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:57a-31: bsam yas ye shes las byung bas //
T02D2663b-2:57a-32: de bas de rnams bsam yas te //
T02D2663b-2:57a-33: zhes gsungs te de thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid
T02D2663b-2:57a-34: kyi ye shes bsam du med pa las byung ba

T02D2663b-2:57a-36: pa chad pa med pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o
T02D2663b-2:57a-37: // de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /

T02D2663b-2:57a-39: sems can don phyir tha dad 'gyur //

T02D2663b-2:57b-10: lha yi tshad kyang go rims bzhin //

T02D2663b-2:57b-17: phyag rgya rnams kyang de nas byung //

T02D2663b-2:57b-21: lha'i lus su byin gyis brlabs pa dang phyag rgya
T02D2663b-2:57b-22: des slob ma la sogs pa srung ba ste /
T02D2663b-2:57b-23: de bsrungs na chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan mas btab

T02D2663b-2:57b-25: rten na rgyal po'i rgya dang ldan pa'i skyes bu
T02D2663b-2:57b-26: la sus kyang gtso bar mi 'gyur ba dang 'dra'o
T02D2663b-2:57b-27: zhes sngar bzhin du bshad do //
T02D2663b-2:57b-28: de bas mdor na chos kyi dbyings //

T02D2663b-2:57b-30: ces pa ni mdor na phyag rgya rnams chos kyi

T02D2663b-2:57b-32: pa'o // dbang bskur gsum du shes bya ste //
T02D2663b-2:57b-34: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags //
T02D2663b-2:57b-35: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni dbang bskur ba rnam pa gsum bshad de //
T02D2663b-2:57b-36: phyag rgya gang zhig dbang bskur ba //

T02D2663b-2:58a-5: gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis //
T02D2663b-2:58a-6: kun nas bslangs par yang dag bshad //

T02D2663b-2:58a-8: dang yi ge 'khor lo bskor b'ai dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2663b-2:58a-9: mdun du dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor bris nas sngar
T02D2663b-2:58a-10: ji skad bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur
T02D2663b-2:58a-11: bar gsungs pa'o // gsum pa yid kyis shes bya ste //
T02D2663b-2:58a-12: yul dang dus tshod spangs pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:58a-13: zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du yid kyis
T02D2663b-2:58a-14: dbang bskur ba ste 'og nas dngos su 'byung ngo
T02D2663b-2:58a-15: // bla ma legs par mgu byas nas //

T02D2663b-2:58a-17: dbang bskur 'di ni mchog yin par //
T02D2663b-2:58a-18: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags //
T02D2663b-2:58a-19: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gong ma gnyis su phyag
T02D2663b-2:58a-20: rgyas dbang bskur nas rjes su gnang ba'i tshig smras
T02D2663b-2:58a-22: phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu slob dpon slob
T02D2663b-2:58a-23: ma'i rim gro dang nan tan la sogs pas mgu
T02D2663b-2:58a-24: nas khyod kyis deng phyin tshad chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D2663b-2:58a-25: bskor cig ces pa la sogs pa'i tshig tu shes
T02D2663b-2:58a-26: par bya'o // phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba dang po
T02D2663b-2:58a-27: dang dbang bskur ba gnyis pa ni snying rje chen
T02D2663b-2:58a-28: po 'byung ba dang yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i
T02D2663b-2:58a-30: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni yid kyis dbang bskur
T02D2663b-2:58a-31: ba dngos su gsungs pas gong ma gnyis mi bya
T02D2663b-2:58a-32: bar shes pa'o // 'di rnams kyang 'dir tshig tsam
T02D2663b-2:58a-33: bshad kyis don bsdus pa'i don nyid du gtan la
T02D2663b-2:58a-35: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor na ni //
T02D2663b-2:58a-36: dam tshig can rnams sngar bshad de //
T02D2663b-2:58a-38: dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya //
T02D2663b-2:58a-39: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni dam tshig can gyi rim pa'i bshad pa yin te /

T02D2663b-2:58a-41: pa yang kha cig ni dam tshig can du 'dod
T02D2663b-2:58a-42: pa'i phyir 'jug la kha cig ni sgrub par byed
T02D2663b-2:58a-43: pa'i phyir 'jug / kha cig ni slob dpon du
T02D2663b-2:58b-0: de la @58b dam tshig can du 'dod pa'i phyir 'jug pa ni /
T02D2663b-2:58b-1: dkyil 'khor 'di gsum las gang yang rung bar zhugs
T02D2663b-2:58b-2: te dam tshig can du gyur na dkyil 'khor lhag
T02D2663b-2:58b-3: ma gnyis la mi ltos la /

T02D2663b-2:58b-6: dam tshig shes pa gcig ces bya //

T02D2663b-2:58b-14: de la phyag rgya mi bstan zhing //
T02D2663b-2:58b-15: sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:58b-17: de ltar dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas phyag rgya dang
T02D2663b-2:58b-18: sngags mi sbyin par byang chub kyi sems bsgoms du
T02D2663b-2:58b-19: bcug ste goms par gyur na /
T02D2663b-2:58b-20: byang chub sems kyi bye brag las //

T02D2663b-2:58b-22: zhes bya bas gdod phyag rgya dang sngags sbyin par gsungs so //
T02D2663b-2:58b-24: dam tshig can gnyis shes par bya //
T02D2663b-2:58b-25: zhes pa ni de ltar byang chub kyi sems goms
T02D2663b-2:58b-26: nas yang dkyil 'khor du bcug ste phyag rgya dang
T02D2663b-2:58b-27: sngags byin pa de ni dam tshig can gnyis par
T02D2663b-2:58b-28: shes par bya'o // dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong //
T02D2663b-2:58b-29: las dang bya ba la yang sbyar //

T02D2663b-2:58b-31: de yang dam tshig shes par bshad //
T02D2663b-2:58b-32: ces pa ni dkyil 'khor kyang mthong la //

T02D2663b-2:58b-34: cing slob dpon du lung ma bstan pa de ni
T02D2663b-2:58b-35: dam tshig shes pa gsum pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:58b-36: phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams //
T02D2663b-2:58b-37: de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan //
T02D2663b-2:58b-38: gsang ba'i ye shes byung ba yis //

T02D2663b-2:58b-41: yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ka dbang bskur ba'am /

T02D2663b-2:59a-20: thams cad mkhyen par ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:59a-21: ji ltar bden pa mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:59a-22: zhes pa ni dris pa de dag bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:59a-23: brtul zhugs bzang po byang chub phyir //
T02D2663b-2:59a-24: gang zhig sems ni bsgom pa na //
T02D2663b-2:59a-25: sngags pa'i gnas gsum mi dmigs pa //
T02D2663b-2:59a-26: de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin //
T02D2663b-2:59a-27: zhes pa ni gang zhig byang chub kyi sems rtag tu bsgoms te /
T02D2663b-2:59a-28: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas gsum mam /
T02D2663b-2:59a-29: 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med
T02D2663b-2:59a-30: pa'i khams kyi gnas gsum du 'jug pa'i byang chub

T02D2663b-2:59a-33: thabs kyi snying stobs skyes nas su //
T02D2663b-2:59a-34: sems can don la sbyor ba ni //
T02D2663b-2:59a-35: dmigs su med pa'i spyod pa thob //
T02D2663b-2:59a-36: rgyal ba'i mchog tu shes par bya //

T02D2663b-2:59b-15: la sems ri rab bzhin du mi g-yo bar 'gyur

T02D2663b-2:59b-33: gang yang byang chub kyi sems thob pa de ni
T02D2663b-2:59b-34: bden zhing yang dag pa mi slu ba ste ji
T02D2663b-2:59b-35: ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang /

T02D2663b-2:59b-37: gang gis byang chub kyi sems thob pa yang bsgrubs nas /

T02D2663b-2:59b-40: rdo rje 'dzin chen po gang yang rung ba cig
