T02D2663b-2:60a-13: de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang //
T02D2663b-2:60a-14: zhes pa nis rab tu dga' ba thob pa las grub pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:60a-16: zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi mngon par shes pa lnga grub pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:60a-17: sangs rgyas nyid dang zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gyur pa'i rig 'dzin grub pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:60a-18: gang zhan zhes pa ni rig 'dzin pa la rnams grub pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:60a-19: de nyid kyi gzungs kyi grub pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:60a-20: gong ma gsum ni sems kyi grub par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:60a-21: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //
T02D2663b-2:60a-23: yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob //
T02D2663b-2:60a-24: ces pa'i bar gyis grub pa'i dus bshad de /
T02D2663b-2:60a-25: de las grub pa'i dus kyang tshe 'di la grub
T02D2663b-2:60a-26: pa dang tshe phyi ma la grub pa rnam pa
T02D2663b-2:60a-27: gnyis so // rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi //
T02D2663b-2:60a-28: las ni mi srid pa nyams shing //
T02D2663b-2:60a-29: rnam smin rnam par ma smin te //
T02D2663b-2:60a-30: dngos grub dag gis dus su 'dod //
T02D2663b-2:60a-31: ces pa ni tshe 'di la grub pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:60a-32: rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa'i las rnams ma zad
T02D2663b-2:60a-33: de tshe snga ma'i rgyud go drug la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:60a-34: nas las bsags pa tshe 'di'i rgyud la ma nyams
T02D2663b-2:60a-35: shing bdag gi phung po gson na zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:60a-36: rnam smin rnam par smin pa de //
T02D2663b-2:60a-37: zhes ston la de ltar yang gson la tshe dang
T02D2663b-2:60a-38: bsod nams la sogs pa'i rgyud bsags pa'i 'bras bu
T02D2663b-2:60a-39: yang 'dir smin par gyur cing snga ma'i las rnams
T02D2663b-2:60a-40: ma zad pas bdag tshe ring ba'i rnam smin rnam
T02D2663b-2:60a-41: par smin pas bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyud mthu
T02D2663b-2:60a-43: sgrub pa'i tshe de ltar tshe dang bsod nams gnyis
T02D2663b-2:60a-44: bsrungs na de tshe 'di nyid la grub par bshad
T02D2663b-2:60b-0: do // mdor na @60b gang tshe dus gcig tu //
T02D2663b-2:60b-1: las dang skye ba 'phang gyur pa //
T02D2663b-2:60b-2: de tshe 'ang sngags pas dngos grub ni //
T02D2663b-2:60b-3: yid las yang dag 'byung ba thob //
T02D2663b-2:60b-4: ces pa ni dngos grub bsgrub pa ni las dang tshes ma btang ste /
T02D2663b-2:60b-5: dus gcig tu las dang tshe zad par gyur na
T02D2663b-2:60b-6: sgrub pa'i 'bras bu sngags pa des tshe phyi ma
T02D2663b-2:60b-7: la bsgrub mi dgos par rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:60b-8: rigs su skye pa dang rig 'dzin la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:60b-9: skye ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:60b-10: yid las yang dag 'byung ba yis //
T02D2663b-2:60b-11: zhes pa ni rdzas la sogs pas bsgrub mi dgos
T02D2663b-2:60b-12: par tshe 'phos ma thag tu yid nyid kyis grub
T02D2663b-2:60b-13: pa de dag thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2663b-2:60b-14: grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba ni //
T02D2663b-2:60b-16: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga' //
T02D2663b-2:60b-17: zhes pa'i bar gyis ni grub pa'i 'bras bu rnams dris pa'i lan bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:60b-18: grub nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba ni /
T02D2663b-2:60b-19: ji ltar sgyu ma 'jigs med bzhin //
T02D2663b-2:60b-20: sngags kyi dra bas rmongs byed pa //
T02D2663b-2:60b-21: ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin //
T02D2663b-2:60b-22: zhes pa ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i grub pa bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:60b-23: ji ltar mig 'phrul gzhan nam mkha' la 'gro ba
T02D2663b-2:60b-24: dang rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs byed ba bzhin du sngags
T02D2663b-2:60b-25: pa de yang rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas
T02D2663b-2:60b-26: nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang sngags kyi mthus rnam
T02D2663b-2:60b-27: pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa la sogs par ston
T02D2663b-2:60b-29: gang la lus dang ngag med par //
T02D2663b-2:60b-30: dri za'i grong khyer de bzhin te //
T02D2663b-2:60b-31: de bzhin mi snang 'gyur zhes bya //
T02D2663b-2:60b-32: de ni de na gnas pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:60b-33: zhes pa ni rig 'dzin la sogs pa grub nas
T02D2663b-2:60b-34: mi snang bar gyur pa'i dpe dri za'i grong khyer
T02D2663b-2:60b-35: las blangs nas bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:60b-36: ji ltar dri za'i grong khyer lus la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:60b-37: dang dngos su mi snang la gnas par byed pa
T02D2663b-2:60b-38: de bzhin du / sngags pa de yang grub nas
T02D2663b-2:60b-39: lus kyang mi snang la tshig tu brjod pa yang
T02D2663b-2:60b-40: mi thos par nam mkha' la mi snang bar gyur
T02D2663b-2:60b-41: cing bar snang la gnas par byed do zhes bshad
T02D2663b-2:60b-42: de bzhin du / do // ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na //
T02D2663b-2:60b-43: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su ni //
T02D2663b-2:60b-44: lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la //
T02D2663b-2:60b-45: de nyid kyis kyang de ma song //
T02D2663b-2:60b-46: de bzhin rnal 'byor gnyid kyis kyang //
T02D2663b-2:60b-47: sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dang //
T02D2663b-2:60b-48: bsod nams byas pa'i las rnams kyis //
T02D2663b-2:61a-2: ces pa ni sngags pa rig 'dzin la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:61a-3: grub nas lus 'di yang mi 'dor bar nam mkha'
T02D2663b-2:61a-4: la sogs pa la 'gro ba'i dpe rmi lam las
T02D2663b-2:61a-6: ji ltar skyes bu nyal ba'i rmi lam na sum
T02D2663b-2:61a-7: cu rtsa gsum la sogs pa'i gnas mthong bar yang
T02D2663b-2:61a-9: sngags pa de yang rnal 'byor gyi dbang gis lus
T02D2663b-2:61a-10: 'di ni ma bor bar nam mkha' la sogs par
T02D2663b-2:61a-11: 'gro ba yang rang gis mthong ngo //
T02D2663b-2:61a-12: gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yang ston nus par 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:61a-14: ces pa ni gzugs sna tshogs ston pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:61a-15: lus dang ngag yid las byung ba'i //
T02D2663b-2:61a-16: gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu 'dra //
T02D2663b-2:61a-17: de las rnam par bsams pa'i don //
T02D2663b-2:61a-19: zhes pa ni sngags kyi grub pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu las dpe blangs nas bshad ba ste /
T02D2663b-2:61a-20: ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu gang bsams pa'i
T02D2663b-2:61a-21: don rnams brtags mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa
T02D2663b-2:61a-22: nyid du 'byor bar gyur pa de bzhin du sngags
T02D2663b-2:61a-23: grub pa'i 'bras bu yang gang 'dod pa rnams brtags
T02D2663b-2:61a-24: mi dgos par lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'byor
T02D2663b-2:61a-26: ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams su //
T02D2663b-2:61a-27: 'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis //
T02D2663b-2:61a-28: mi gos de bzhin sngags pa yang //
T02D2663b-2:61a-29: rtogs pa'i spyod yul kun gyis so //
T02D2663b-2:61a-30: zhes pa ni grub pa thob pa de yang ni
T02D2663b-2:61a-31: gza' dang skar ma dang ltas ngan la sogs pas
T02D2663b-2:61a-32: mi tshugs par bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:61a-33: ji ltar nam mkha' la 'dus byas la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:61a-34: dri mas mi gos pa de bzhin du grub pa'i
T02D2663b-2:61a-35: sngags pa de yang gza' dang skar ma la sogs
T02D2663b-2:61a-36: pa bzang ngan la mi ltos te /
T02D2663b-2:61a-37: de dag gis ltas ngan la sogs pas mi tshugs par shes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:61a-39: nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing //
T02D2663b-2:61a-40: rnam par bsgoms na sngags pa de //
T02D2663b-2:61a-41: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga' //
T02D2663b-2:61a-42: zhes pa ni sngags pa grub pa thob nas sangs
T02D2663b-2:61a-43: rgyas dang lhan cig tu 'grogs pa thob par bshad
T02D2663b-2:61a-44: pa de / 'di kun 'du shes tsam du ni //
T02D2663b-2:61b-0: zhes pa 'dus byas la sogs pa'i @61b chos 'di
T02D2663b-2:61b-1: dag thams cad dngos su spong ba ma yin gyi
T02D2663b-2:61b-2: // 'du shes tsam du byang chub kyi sems bsgom
T02D2663b-2:61b-3: pa'i tshe bsgoms pas kun du sangs rgyas pa dang
T02D2663b-2:61b-4: lhan cig tu 'grogs shing de la chos nyan pa
T02D2663b-2:61b-5: la sogs pas dga' bar 'gyur zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:61b-6: sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo yis //
T02D2663b-2:61b-7: sbyin sreg gnyis su bshad pa ni //
T02D2663b-2:61b-8: phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste //
T02D2663b-2:61b-9: de yang tshim par bya dang bcas //
T02D2663b-2:61b-10: zhes ba ni sbyin sreg las me dag dang /
T02D2663b-2:61b-11: zhes sngar dris pa la rnam pa gnyis ni sngar bshad zin la /
T02D2663b-2:61b-12: 'dir ni sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis phyi ma'i me
T02D2663b-2:61b-13: dang nang gi me rnam pa gnyis su bshad de
T02D2663b-2:61b-14: / de yang tshim par bya ba bcas //
T02D2663b-2:61b-15: zhes gsungs pa de la nang gi sems kyi tshim
T02D2663b-2:61b-16: par bya ba ni rang gi sa bon las slar
T02D2663b-2:61b-17: lha'i gzugs su bsgyur bar sngar bshad do //
T02D2663b-2:61b-18: phyi rol gyi me ni mnyes par bya ba'i bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis tshim par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:61b-19: lha rnams kyis ni so so yis //
T02D2663b-2:61b-21: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D2663b-2:61b-22: gsang sngags 'bras bu skal ba ldan //
T02D2663b-2:61b-23: zhes pa'i bar gyis lha rnams kyi rang bzhin dang grub tshad rnams bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:61b-24: lha rnams kyang ni so so yis //
T02D2663b-2:61b-25: rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas su //
T02D2663b-2:61b-26: zhes pa ni lha rnams kyi rang bzhin shes par
T02D2663b-2:61b-27: byas na de dag gi grub pa'i 'bras bu yang
T02D2663b-2:61b-29: de la 'jig rten las 'das ba'i lha rnams kyi rang bzhin ni sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-2:61b-30: 'dir ni 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D2663b-2:61b-31: bshad nas de'i mthus 'bras bu'i tshad shes par bya
T02D2663b-2:61b-33: 'jig rten pa yi sngags rnams kyi //
T02D2663b-2:61b-34: tshad dag legs par gsungs pa ni //
T02D2663b-2:61b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:61b-36: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i lha mthu chen po de
T02D2663b-2:61b-37: dag gis smras pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya rnams ni
T02D2663b-2:61b-38: 'bras bu 'phral du ster pa ni de dag gi
T02D2663b-2:61b-40: tshad ces pa ni de dag gi mthu la bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:61b-42: chos can de dag brtan pa med //
T02D2663b-2:61b-43: ces pa ni de dag gi khyad par gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:61b-44: 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams 'bras bu tshe 'di la 'phral du ster mod kyi /
T02D2663b-2:61b-45: de rnams skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin pas mi rtag pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:62a-3: gsang sngags tshad ni sngon bshad pa //
T02D2663b-2:62a-4: zhes pa'i bar gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags te /
T02D2663b-2:62a-5: byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs
T02D2663b-2:62a-6: rgyas la sogs pas gsungs pas sngags rnams thog ma'i
T02D2663b-2:62a-7: byed pa med cing las dang skye ba bcad pa
T02D2663b-2:62a-8: ste / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug
T02D2663b-2:62a-9: gi nyes pa gsum dang bral bas skye zhing 'jig
T02D2663b-2:62a-10: pa la sogs pa med de tshad rnams sngar bshad
T02D2663b-2:62a-12: dus gsum las ni shin tu 'das //
T02D2663b-2:62a-13: rten cing 'brel pa las byung ba //
T02D2663b-2:62a-14: mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu can //
T02D2663b-2:62a-15: dag gi lus las byung ba'o //
T02D2663b-2:62a-16: zhes pa ni de lta bas na 'jig rten las
T02D2663b-2:62a-17: 'das pa'i sngags rnams 'jig rten pa ltar mthong ba'i
T02D2663b-2:62a-18: chos 'ba' zhig la 'bras bu 'phral du ster ba
T02D2663b-2:62a-20: mthong ba'i chos dang ma mthong ba gnyi ga la 'bras bu ster ro zhes pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:62a-21: mthong ba ni lha dang mi la sogs pa 'grub ba'o //
T02D2663b-2:62a-22: ma mthong ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:62a-24: bskal ba gcig tu bshad pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:62a-25: zhes gsungs pa ni 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams kyi
T02D2663b-2:62a-26: grub pa'i 'bras bu ji srid thub pa gsungs pa
T02D2663b-2:62a-27: ste / 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu ni bskal ba gcig gi bar du thub ces pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:62a-28: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D2663b-2:62a-30: zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams
T02D2663b-2:62a-31: kyi 'bras bu bskal ba las 'das par thub ces
T02D2663b-2:62a-32: pa'o // sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang //
T02D2663b-2:62a-33: rgyal sras rnams kyi ting 'dzin ni //
T02D2663b-2:62a-34: mtshan ma med cing dag pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:62a-35: 'jig rten par ni mtshan mar bcas //
T02D2663b-2:62a-36: zhes pa ni sngags pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:62a-37: de la spyir ting nge 'dzin la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2663b-2:62a-38: don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi'o //
T02D2663b-2:62a-39: de la don dam pa ni aa la sogs pa yi ge 'bru re'i sgo nas bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:62a-40: kun rdzob kyi ni stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la
T02D2663b-2:62a-41: sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshig tu gyur pa de
T02D2663b-2:62a-42: dag gi sngags kyi phreng ba'i tshig las ting nge
T02D2663b-2:62a-43: 'dzin gyur pa'i yi ge rnams te sngar bshad zin
T02D2663b-2:62a-44: to // 'dir ni ting nge 'dzin gyi don rnams bshad ba ste /
T02D2663b-2:62b-0: sangs rgyas drang @62b srong chen po ni //
T02D2663b-2:62b-1: lus dang ngag dang yid gsum thub pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pas drang srong ste /
T02D2663b-2:62b-2: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa kun du sangs rgyas pa la sogs pa la bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:62b-3: rgyal sras rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:62b-4: de dag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi chos thams cad
T02D2663b-2:62b-5: gzod ma nas ma skyes pa rnam par mi rtog
T02D2663b-2:62b-6: pa'i mtshan nyid can yin pas mtshan ma med pas
T02D2663b-2:62b-7: dag pa'o // 'jig rten par ni mtshan mar bcas //
T02D2663b-2:62b-8: zhes pa ni nam byang chub sems dpa' ting nge
T02D2663b-2:62b-9: 'dzin las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par
T02D2663b-2:62b-10: brgyan pa la sogs pa rnam pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D2663b-2:62b-11: spyod pa dang / 'jug pa dang sangs rgyas shing
T02D2663b-2:62b-12: mngon par byang chub nas sngon gyi smon lam gyi
T02D2663b-2:62b-13: shugs kyis sku mi zad pa'i 'khor lo la sogs
T02D2663b-2:62b-14: pa 'byung ba ya mtshan dang bcas pa'i spyod pa
T02D2663b-2:62b-15: ste de dag la yang 'jig rten pa mtshan ma
T02D2663b-2:62b-17: gnyis su na mu stegs byed kyi 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2663b-2:62b-18: lha rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni dngos po yod
T02D2663b-2:62b-19: par lta bas na mtshan ma dang bcas zhes bya'o
T02D2663b-2:62b-20: // rnam par smin pa 'di nyid la //
T02D2663b-2:62b-21: las kyi 'bras bu smin gyur pa //
T02D2663b-2:62b-22: nam zhig dngos grub thob pa na //
T02D2663b-2:62b-23: de tshe las dang zlog par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:62b-24: zhes pa ni sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin
T02D2663b-2:62b-25: pa'i phung po lnga po 'di la lha'i gzugs su
T02D2663b-2:62b-26: smin par 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'bras bu smin par
T02D2663b-2:62b-27: 'gyur te / nam bdag gi ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2663b-2:62b-28: sogs grub pa thob pa ni de'i tshe grub pa
T02D2663b-2:62b-29: de las kyi rnam par smin pas de zil gyis
T02D2663b-2:62b-30: mnan nas 'bras bu mi smin par ldog par 'gyur
T02D2663b-2:62b-31: 'gyur te / ro zhes pa'o // sems ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir //
T02D2663b-2:62b-32: rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams spangs shing //
T02D2663b-2:62b-33: las dang tshe las rnam par grol //
T02D2663b-2:62b-34: nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:62b-35: zhes pa ni grub pa'i mthar sangs rgyas su 'gyur par bstan te /
T02D2663b-2:62b-36: sgrub pa pos byang chub kyi sems dag par bsgom
T02D2663b-2:62b-37: pas sems kyi ngo bo nyid med par rtogs te
T02D2663b-2:62b-38: / chos kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu dmigs su med pas rgyu las dang 'bras bu che ste /
T02D2663b-2:62b-39: las dang tshe dag las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur te /
T02D2663b-2:62b-40: de ltar las dang tshe las rnam par grol na
T02D2663b-2:62b-41: nam mkha' lta bur gzung ba dang 'dzin pa spangs
T02D2663b-2:63a-1: mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:63a-2: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes pa nas //
T02D2663b-2:63a-3: snying rje chen po'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod
T02D2663b-2:63a-4: kyi de bri ba'i cho ga nyon cig ces pa'i
T02D2663b-2:63a-5: bar gyis gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin dang
T02D2663b-2:63a-6: yon tan brjod nas nyon cig ces pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:63a-7: de la phyag rgya'i gzugs su dgod ba'i rim par
T02D2663b-2:63a-8: phye ba zhes pa ni snying rje chen po 'byung

T02D2663b-2:69a-29: chud par bya'o zhes pa ni phyag rgya de dag

T02D2663b-2:69b-6: // / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i
T02D2663b-2:69b-7: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa zhes

T02D2663b-2:69b-10: dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i rim pa lda de nub

T02D2663b-2:69b-15: nang du slob ma snga ma bzhin du gzhag ste
T02D2663b-2:69b-16: slob dpon yang snga ma bzhin du rang gi ting
T02D2663b-2:69b-17: nge 'dzin la gnas nas slob ma'i snying gar yi
T02D2663b-2:69b-18: ge ra bsams te yi ge de'i sgra'i de kho

T02D2663b-2:69b-21: par bshig ste rdul phran de dag kyang mi dmigs

T02D2663b-2:69b-23: lus don dam par stong par bya'o //

T02D2663b-2:69b-28: aa las bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gyur bar bsam mo zhes pa ni 'dus pa'i don to //

T02D2663b-2:69b-30: kun du bslabs pa'i sngags pa ni //

T02D2663b-2:69b-32: dang yi ge 'khor lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis

T02D2663b-2:70b-15: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i //

T02D2663b-2:70b-28: dam tshig ni gzhan mi bya //

T02D2663b-2:71a-20: pa'i phyag rgya dang padma'i sbubs kyi phyag rgya gnyis

T02D2663b-2:71a-22: de rnams ni rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T02D2663b-2:71a-23: lus dang ngag dang yid rdzogs par byed pa'o //

T02D2663b-2:71a-29: gyi phyag rgya ni ngag rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag
T02D2663b-2:71a-30: pa'o // rgya'o // bcom ldan 'das kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2663b-2:71a-31: 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal
T02D2663b-2:71a-33: de rnams sbyar bar bya ba'i rim pa yang thog

T02D2663b-2:71a-36: gdan du byin gyis brlabs te /

T02D2663b-2:71b-1: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ji skad gsungs

T02D2663b-2:71b-19: che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa'i phyir te /
T02D2663b-2:71b-20: de rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod yul yin gyi /
T02D2663b-2:71b-21: byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyi
T02D2663b-2:71b-22: sbyod yul du ma gyur pas phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2663b-2:71b-23: kyang de bshad du gsol zhes ma gsol to //
T02D2663b-2:71b-24: gsang ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa ni dam tshig med
T02D2663b-2:71b-25: pa dang dbang ma bskur ba la sogs pa kun
T02D2663b-2:71b-26: la mi bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:71b-27: gsang ba dang bcas pa zhes pa ni rdo rje
T02D2663b-2:71b-28: gdan dang padma dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs
T02D2663b-2:71b-29: pa lha rang gi gzugs su mi bstan phar lag
T02D2663b-2:71b-30: pa'i phyag rgyar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:71b-31: lha'i gnas byin gyis rlob par gyur pa zhes pa lha'i gnas ni rdo rje gdan dang padma ste /
T02D2663b-2:71b-32: der lha rnams gnas par 'gyur bas na rdo rje
T02D2663b-2:71b-33: mi shigs pa'i phyag rgya dang padma'i phyag rgya gnyis
T02D2663b-2:71b-34: la bya'o // gnyis su na phyag rgya brgyad char la bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:72a-1: rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs na rang gi lus la lha gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:72a-2: rang gi gsang sngags kyis mtshan pa //
T02D2663b-2:72a-3: zhes pa ni phyag rgya de dag so so'i sngags
T02D2663b-2:72a-4: sogs 'og nas 'byung ba'i mtshan ma rnams gyis btab
T02D2663b-2:72a-5: ste / phyag rgya de bcing ba na sngags kyang der bsam mo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-2:72a-6: dkyil 'khor dang ldan par zhes pa ni phyag rgya
T02D2663b-2:72a-7: de dag so so'i dbang chen la sogs pa ji
T02D2663b-2:72a-8: ltar 'og nas 'byung ba dang ldan pa zhes pa
T02D2663b-2:72a-9: ste / rang rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams phyag rgya nyid kyi nang du bsams la /
T02D2663b-2:72a-10: rdo rje dang padma'i gdan dang /
T02D2663b-2:72a-11: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ni so so'i
T02D2663b-2:72a-12: gnas su yang ldan par bsam mo zhes pa'i don
T02D2663b-2:72a-13: to // rang gi lha'i tshul du rnal 'byor du
T02D2663b-2:72a-14: bya ba zhes pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa
T02D2663b-2:72a-15: dang rab dang 'bring la sogs pa'i bsgrub pa'i bya
T02D2663b-2:72a-16: ba rnams la rang gi lha nyid kyi rnal 'byor
T02D2663b-2:72a-17: du byas pa la phyag rgya 'di rnams dang ldan
T02D2663b-2:72a-18: to // zhes pa'o // byang chub sems dpa'i spyad
T02D2663b-2:72a-19: pa spyod pa rnams cho ga bdag nyid lha'i gzugs
T02D2663b-2:72a-20: su bsgyur ba la phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi ji
T02D2663b-2:72a-21: skad bshad pa'i rim pa bzhin du so so'i byin
T02D2663b-2:72a-22: gyis brlabs na lha'i gzugs su bstan par 'gyur ro
T02D2663b-2:72a-23: to // zhes pa'o // zhes pa'o // shes nas
T02D2663b-2:72a-24: kyang rang gi lha'i tshul du gnas nas dngos grub
T02D2663b-2:72a-25: thob par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni de'i skur bsgyur
T02D2663b-2:72a-26: te phyag rgya de rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas
T02D2663b-2:72a-27: brtan par byas pa tsam gyis cho ga ma yin
T02D2663b-2:72a-28: to // zhes pa'o // zhes pa'o // gyi /
T02D2663b-2:72a-29: rang gi lha'i bya ba zhi ba dang rgyas pa
T02D2663b-2:72a-30: rab dang 'bring la sogs pa'i grub pa dang las
T02D2663b-2:72a-31: rnams bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes pa ste
T02D2663b-2:72a-32: to // zhes pa'o // zhes pa'o // gyi / / de lta bu yod de zhes 'brel to //
T02D2663b-2:72a-33: rdo rje mi shigs pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2663b-2:72a-34: padma'i sbubs kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2663b-2:72a-35: sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D2663b-2:72a-36: pa na phyag snga ma las shes pa ni de
T02D2663b-2:72a-37: dag gsum char yang gzi brjid 'byung ba'i phyag rgya
T02D2663b-2:72a-38: la snyeg par shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:72a-39: de bzhin du gzungs kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:72a-40: phyag rgya gsum po la phyag rgya snga ma las
T02D2663b-2:72a-41: shes pa ni yan lag thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag
T02D2663b-2:72a-43: gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'ja' 'dra ba mtshan
T02D2663b-2:72b-0: ma thams cad @72b dang ldan pa rdo rje bdan
T02D2663b-2:72b-1: phyar ba zhes pa la gzungs ni rdo rje'i gdan
T02D2663b-2:72b-2: dang padma dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:72b-3: dngos po ji ltar bsam pa rnams mi brjed par
T02D2663b-2:72b-4: byas na mthu thams cad dang ldan par dgongs pas
T02D2663b-2:72b-5: 'ja' dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor bzhi char gyi kha
T02D2663b-2:72b-7: mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa ni dkyil 'khor
T02D2663b-2:72b-8: so so'i mtshan ma rdo rje dang padma rdo rje
T02D2663b-2:72b-9: padma la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:72b-10: rdo rje ba dang phyag ba ni dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2663b-2:72b-11: dbyi bas 'ja' 'dra bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor mtshan
T02D2663b-2:72b-12: ma bdan rab tu mi g-yo ba bya ba'i phyir
T02D2663b-2:72b-13: rdo rje dang ldan pa'i ba dang no //
T02D2663b-2:72b-14: chos gnas pa'i phyag rgya'i klad kor gnyis zhes pa ni stong pa dang stong pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2663b-2:72b-15: dkyil 'khor ni rnal 'byor 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2663b-2:72b-16: nam mkha' ste nam mkha'i kha dog las khyad par
T02D2663b-2:72b-17: du sngo bar bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi
T02D2663b-2:72b-18: mthu thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir rlung gi dkyil
T02D2663b-2:72b-19: 'khor gyi shas che bar bya bar dgongs pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:72b-20: gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di dag ni gsang ba'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2663b-2:72b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu gsang ba
T02D2663b-2:72b-22: yin pas gzhan su la yang ma sbyin cig ces
T02D2663b-2:72b-23: sbyar te / dbang bskur ba la sogs pa 'og
T02D2663b-2:72b-24: nas 'byung ba'i yon tan ming gis smos pa rnams
T02D2663b-2:72b-25: mi ldan zhing dam tshig med pa su la yang
T02D2663b-2:72b-26: mi sbyin gyi yon tan de rnams kyang ldan pa
T02D2663b-2:72b-27: la ni sbyin no zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:72b-28: dbang bskur ba zhes pa ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2663b-2:72b-29: cho rigs btsun pa zhes pa ni bram ze dang
T02D2663b-2:72b-30: rgyal rigs rnams la sbyin gyi nye ba la sogs
T02D2663b-2:72b-31: pa rigs ngan pa rnams la mi sbyin no zhes
T02D2663b-2:72b-32: pa'o // gnyis su na rigs dang ldan zhes pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:72b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang padma'i rigs kyi lha rnams la brten cing de la gnas pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:72b-34: gsum du na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs
T02D2663b-2:72b-35: pa'i sngags pa'i spyod pa la brtson zhing 'bad pa
T02D2663b-2:72b-37: spro ba can zhes pa ni sngags kyi sbyod pa la brtson pa la brtson pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:72b-38: yi dam la brtan pa zhes pa ni ji ltar
T02D2663b-2:72b-39: bsams pa'i don ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong
T02D2663b-2:72b-40: ba'o // bla ma gus pa zhes pa ni bla ma la dang pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:73a-0: @73a * // byas pa gzo ba zhes pa ni bla ma la
T02D2663b-2:73a-1: dad cing gus pas ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du
T02D2663b-2:73a-2: yang dag par sbyor zhing nan tan byed pa'i phyir
T02D2663b-2:73a-3: ro // gtsang sbra che ba zhes pa ni lus gtsang na sems 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:73a-4: bdag gi lus dang srog la yang mi lta ba
T02D2663b-2:73a-5: zhes pa ni las dang bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:73a-6: sngags kyi spyod pa la lus dang srog kyang mi
T02D2663b-2:73a-7: phongs te de lta bu la phyag rgya de rnams
T02D2663b-2:73a-9: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2663b-2:73a-10: byang chub pa rnam par sbrul pa byin gyis rlob
T02D2663b-2:73a-11: pa las / gsang ba'i phyag rgya brgyad rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o /
T02D2663b-2:73a-13: // / da ni nang yid kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i skabs 'chad de /
T02D2663b-2:73a-14: yid kyi dkyil 'khor bri ba yang sbyir dkyil 'khor gnyis te /
T02D2663b-2:73a-17: de la rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni rgya che zhing bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
T02D2663b-2:73a-18: mdor bsdus te bstan pa ni yid kyi dkyil 'khor du shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:73a-19: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor yang ji skad gsungs pa bzhin du rdzogs par dkar ste /
T02D2663b-2:73a-20: de mdor bsdus pa bstan pa ni rgyud phyi ma las dkyil 'khor bshad pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:73a-21: de bas na yid kyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i sgo nas
T02D2663b-2:73a-22: sems kyi rang bzhin gyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ji
T02D2663b-2:73a-24: 'di ni 'jug pa'i sgo lta bur bstan to //
T02D2663b-2:73a-25: yid kyi dkyil 'khor de bri ba'i thabs bstan pa'i
T02D2663b-2:73a-26: phyir bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs nas
T02D2663b-2:73a-27: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam
T02D2663b-2:73a-28: par gnas shing / sgo khyud dang rta babs rin
T02D2663b-2:73a-29: po che sna lngas rab tu rnam par sbras pas
T02D2663b-2:73a-31: de dag thams cad kyang dngos po med pa las
T02D2663b-2:73a-32: sems kyi dbang tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhin
T02D2663b-2:73a-34: de bas na yid kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:73a-35: yid kyis bskyed pa thams cad rnal 'byor pas sems
T02D2663b-2:73a-36: mnyam par gzhag pa las bkod pa'i mgon po ji
T02D2663b-2:73a-37: lta bur gyur cig ces bsams nas smon lam btab
T02D2663b-2:73a-38: la / ting nge 'dzin du zhugs na ji ltar smon pa de ltar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:73b-0: de ltar yid kyi dkyil 'khor @73b bri ba'i thabs bstan pa yang /
T02D2663b-2:73b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen
T02D2663b-2:73b-2: pos de'i tshe ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la
T02D2663b-2:73b-3: gzigs nas thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes
T02D2663b-2:73b-4: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so
T02D2663b-2:73b-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T02D2663b-2:73b-6: bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis
T02D2663b-2:73b-7: sems can gyi don mdzad pa la sogs pa lhun
T02D2663b-2:73b-8: gyis grub pa nyid du 'byung bas ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663b-2:73b-10: 'on kyang dngos po bstan par bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs na /
T02D2663b-2:73b-11: byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs
T02D2663b-2:73b-12: pa 'dul ba'i 'gro ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-2:73b-13: ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:73b-14: zhugs nas ji ltar ston par 'gyur ba la sogs pa shes par 'gyur te /
T02D2663b-2:73b-15: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin du 'jug go //
T02D2663b-2:73b-16: thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:73b-17: bcom ldan 'das ting de 'dzin de la zhugs na
T02D2663b-2:73b-18: don dam par chos kyi dbyings kyis kun du khyab
T02D2663b-2:73b-19: par rtog pa dang kun rdzob tu yang sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:73b-20: kyi zhing 'di lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par gnas
T02D2663b-2:73b-21: pa la sogs pa gnas kyi khyab par bstan pa
T02D2663b-2:73b-22: rnams khong du chud pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:73b-23: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la zhugs na don
T02D2663b-2:73b-24: dam pa dang kun rdzob rtogs pa de dag 'byung
T02D2663b-2:73b-25: ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin de'i ming thams cad kyi
T02D2663b-2:73b-27: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la gzigs nas zhes
T02D2663b-2:73b-28: pa ni kun du bzang po dang phyag na rdo
T02D2663b-2:73b-29: rje la sogs pa yongs su dag pa'i byang chub
T02D2663b-2:73b-30: sems dpa' rnams kyis ni de dag ji lta ba
T02D2663b-2:73b-32: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don du dngos
T02D2663b-2:73b-33: po yod pa ma yin pa las sems kyi dbang
T02D2663b-2:73b-34: tsam gyis rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar bstan pa
T02D2663b-2:73b-36: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de
T02D2663b-2:73b-37: nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lag mthil
T02D2663b-2:73b-38: bzhin du mnyam par gnas shing zhes pa ni dkyil
T02D2663b-2:73b-39: 'khor bri ba na sngar sa mtho dman la sogs
T02D2663b-2:73b-40: pa snyoms shing sbyang dgos te da'i tshul bstan ba'o
T02D2663b-2:73b-41: // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di zhes pa ni mi
T02D2663b-2:73b-42: mdzed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i khams so
T02D2663b-2:74a-1: bzhin du mnyam par gnas shing zhes pa ni sangs
T02D2663b-2:74a-2: rgyas kyi zhing de ri dang gcong rong la sogs
T02D2663b-2:74a-3: pa med par mnyam par gyur zhes pa ni /
T02D2663b-2:74a-4: tshig des ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'gro ba rnams
T02D2663b-2:74a-5: nam dkyil 'khor 'dri ba na dkyil 'khor gyis de
T02D2663b-2:74a-6: lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par sbyang bar bya ba
T02D2663b-2:74a-7: bstan pa'o // sgo khyud dang rta babs rin po
T02D2663b-2:74a-8: che sna lngas rab tu rnam par sbras pas brgyan
T02D2663b-2:74a-10: sil snyan gyi sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa
T02D2663b-2:74a-11: rnam pa du ma grag pa zhes pa'i bar gyis
T02D2663b-2:74a-12: ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mnyam par gyur nas
T02D2663b-2:74a-13: kyang rgyan de dag gis brgyan par bstan pa ste
T02D2663b-2:74a-14: / des ni dkyil 'khor gyi sa de dag bsnyams
T02D2663b-2:74a-15: nas rta babs dang sgo khyud dang gdugs dang ba
T02D2663b-2:74a-16: dan la sogs pas brgyan pa dang ri mo rnams
T02D2663b-2:74a-17: kyis brgyan par bya ba'i thabs bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:74a-18: padma'i tshe'u chu dri zhim po yan lag brgyad dang
T02D2663b-2:74a-19: ldan pas yongs su gang ba smos pa ni dkyil
T02D2663b-2:74a-20: 'khor gyi nye 'khor du rdzing bu la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:74a-21: bri bar bya'o // yan lag brgyad ni bsil ba dang dang ba dang mngar ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:74a-22: byang chub sems dpa' mang po'i bsod nams kyis bsags
T02D2663b-2:74a-23: pa'i stan dang khang pa dang gzhal med khang yid
T02D2663b-2:74a-24: las byung ba dang ldan par gyur to zhes pa
T02D2663b-2:74a-25: ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der pha rol tu phyin
T02D2663b-2:74a-26: pa las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
T02D2663b-2:74a-27: so so'i bsod nams ji tsam las so so'i stan
T02D2663b-2:74a-28: dang khang pa dang lding khang la sogs pa dang
T02D2663b-2:74a-30: des kyang dkyil 'khor gyis der byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-2:74a-31: la sogs pa lha so so'i gnas dang bcas par
T02D2663b-2:74a-33: padma'i rgyal po chen po zhes pa nas bsod nams
T02D2663b-2:74a-34: kyi rnam par skyed pa dag byung bar gyur to
T02D2663b-2:74a-35: zhes pa'i bar ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i dbus
T02D2663b-2:74a-36: na padma'i rgyal po chen po la de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-2:74a-37: pa bzhugs te / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku las
T02D2663b-2:74a-38: ye shes kyi sems can chos kyi tshig ston pa
T02D2663b-2:74a-39: sha stag byung ngo zhes pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:74a-40: de yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das
T02D2663b-2:74a-41: rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa la de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-2:74a-42: pa'i sku las gyur pa'i lha rnams kyis bskor te
T02D2663b-2:74b-0: bzhugs @74b par bya ba bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:74b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa las byung ba'i chos
T02D2663b-2:74b-2: kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mas mtshan pa zhes pa
T02D2663b-2:74b-3: ni padma'i rgyal po de'i bye brag ste /
T02D2663b-2:74b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa las byung ba ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D2663b-2:74b-5: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dag pa la bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:74b-6: de'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ni ye shes dag pa
T02D2663b-2:74b-7: de'i mtshan ma yin pas dkar por shes par bya
T02D2663b-2:74b-8: ste / mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi
T02D2663b-2:74b-9: ye shes dag pa padma'i rgyal po chen por snang
T02D2663b-2:74b-10: ba byin gyis brlab po zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:74b-11: de'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs pa
T02D2663b-2:74b-12: ni de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes chos kyi dbyings
T02D2663b-2:74b-13: kyi mtshan nyid de las bcom ldan 'das rnam par
T02D2663b-2:74b-14: snang mdzad kyi sku dbyung bar bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:74b-15: chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba la zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:74b-16: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa zhes
T02D2663b-2:74b-17: pa'o // de ltar bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid
T02D2663b-2:74b-18: kyi rang bzhin du gyur kyang phung po lhag ma
T02D2663b-2:74b-19: med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa lta bu ni
T02D2663b-2:74b-20: pa'o // ma yin gyi / sngon gyi smon lam
T02D2663b-2:74b-21: gyi shugs kyis rnam par mi rtog bzhin du kun
T02D2663b-2:74b-22: rdzob kyi bya ba thams cad 'byung bar bstan pa'i
T02D2663b-2:74b-23: phyir sems can gyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji
T02D2663b-2:74b-24: lta ba bzhin du mgu par mdzad pa zhes gsungs
T02D2663b-2:74b-25: pa'o // ma yin gyi / pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:74b-26: cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa stobs
T02D2663b-2:74b-27: bcu la mos pa las byung ba zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:74b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las bung ba'i sku de
T02D2663b-2:74b-29: rnams kyi mthu ni ci las mi tshugs pa sha
T02D2663b-2:74b-30: pa'o // ma yin gyi / pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:74b-31: stag ste / de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi
T02D2663b-2:74b-32: sku tshe kun du sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis
T02D2663b-2:74b-33: stobs bcu la mos pa bskyed pas 'bras bu stobs
T02D2663b-2:74b-34: bcu rdzogs par gyur pa las byung ba zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-2:74b-35: pa'o // ma yin gyi / pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:74b-36: stag ste / // kha dog dang dbyibs rnam pa
T02D2663b-2:74b-37: du mas bdag gi sku brgyan pa zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:74b-38: sku mang po byung ba dag gi khyad par te
T02D2663b-2:74b-39: pa'o // ma yin gyi / pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:74b-40: stag ste / // / de dag kha dog dang
T02D2663b-2:74b-41: gzugs sna tshogs dang bcas pa zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:74b-42: sku mang po de rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid
T02D2663b-2:74b-43: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe bskal
T02D2663b-2:74b-44: pa grangs med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T02D2663b-2:74b-45: pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa'i
T02D2663b-2:74b-46: rgyu las byung bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:75a-1: khrig brgya stong du mar zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:75a-2: de dag byung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig
T02D2663b-2:75a-3: rten gyi khams rnams su sgra mngon par go bar
T02D2663b-2:75a-4: mdzad cing ched du gleng pa 'di gleng ngo zhes
T02D2663b-2:75a-5: pa ni gong du bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:75a-6: kyi zhing lag mthil bzhin du mnyam pa la sogs
T02D2663b-2:75a-7: par dngos su snang ba der rtogs pa'i chos rnams
T02D2663b-2:75a-8: bstan pa de nyid rnam grangs kyis 'og nas byung
T02D2663b-2:75a-9: ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bstan pa ste
T02D2663b-2:75a-11: ae ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2663b-2:75a-13: gang brnyes rnyed pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:75a-15: de la ae ma ho zhes pa ni ngo mtshar du gyur pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:75a-17: shes rab thabs ni bsam mi khyab //
T02D2663b-2:75a-19: shes rab ni chos thams cad bdag med par rtog pa'i rang bzhin yin la /
T02D2663b-2:75a-20: thabs ni de ltar chos thams cad stong par rtogs
T02D2663b-2:75a-21: kyang sems can gyi don du dngos po rnam pa
T02D2663b-2:75a-22: sna tshogs yod par ston pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:75a-23: de dag ngo mtshar che ste bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:75a-24: tshig de dag nyid dgrol ba'i phyir //
T02D2663b-2:75a-25: gnas med pa ni rtogs gyur nas //
T02D2663b-2:75a-26: gnas dang bcas pa'i chos kyang 'chad //
T02D2663b-2:75a-27: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:75a-28: shes rab kyis chos thams cad gzung ba dang 'dzin
T02D2663b-2:75a-29: pa'i gnas med pa stong pa nyid du shes nas
T02D2663b-2:75a-30: shes pa'o // gnas dang bcas pa'i chos kyang 'chad //
T02D2663b-2:75a-31: ces pa ni de ltar shes rab kyis chos thams
T02D2663b-2:75a-32: cad dngos po med par rtogs kyang thabs kyis sems
T02D2663b-2:75a-33: can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:75a-34: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i gnas la sogs pa'i chos
T02D2663b-2:75a-35: rnams dngos po yod par snang ba dngos su ston
T02D2663b-2:75a-36: zhes pa'o // gang dag gis ni chos rnams kyi //
T02D2663b-2:75a-37: chos kyi mtshan nyid rnyed pa dang //
T02D2663b-2:75a-38: shes pa zhes pa ni phung po dang khams dang
T02D2663b-2:75a-39: skye mched la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid
T02D2663b-2:75a-40: gang dag gis mi dmigs par shes pa zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-2:75a-42: gang brnyes rnyed pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:75a-43: zhes pa ni de ltar chos rnams dmigs su med
T02D2663b-2:75a-44: par gang gis shes pa des 'dren pa sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:75b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bras bu thob par @75b 'gyur
T02D2663b-2:75b-2: mdor na chos rnams stong pa nyid du rtogs pa
T02D2663b-2:75b-3: de sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa yin
T02D2663b-2:75b-4: no // de dag gi ched du gleng bde khyed
T02D2663b-2:75b-5: du glengs nas de dag slar yang de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-2:75b-6: pa'i chos kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
T02D2663b-2:75b-7: zhugs so zhes pa ni de ltar chos kyi dbyings
T02D2663b-2:75b-8: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du mi snang bar
T02D2663b-2:75b-9: no // gyur pa'o // de ltar gsang ba'i dkyil
T02D2663b-2:75b-10: 'khor bri ba'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis rang bzhin
T02D2663b-2:75b-12: da ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid bri ba'i thabs bshad de de yang /
T02D2663b-2:75b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
T02D2663b-2:75b-14: rigs kyi bu nang gi dkyil 'khor nyon cig ces pa la sogs pas so //
T02D2663b-2:75b-15: 'di yang slob ma lhag par gnas pa de nyid kyi nub mo bya bar shes par bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:75b-16: de'i rim pa yang de la thog mar slob dpon
T02D2663b-2:75b-17: gyis mchod pa'i yo byad 'di dag la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:75b-18: dngos po gzhung las 'byung ba bzhin du sta gon
T02D2663b-2:75b-19: byas nas slob ma rnams kyang bsags te phyi rol
T02D2663b-2:75b-20: du bkod la / de nas slob dpon de dkyil 'khor gyi khang ba'i nang du zhugs te /
T02D2663b-2:75b-21: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
T02D2663b-2:75b-22: phyag byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te
T02D2663b-2:75b-23: snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bstan pa bzhin
T02D2663b-2:75b-24: du mdun du rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor so so'i
T02D2663b-2:75b-25: sngags 'bru re'am // spyi'i snying pos der bsams te /
T02D2663b-2:75b-26: de nas bdag nyid chos nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D2663b-2:75b-27: phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang
T02D2663b-2:75b-28: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
T02D2663b-2:75b-29: rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:75b-30: rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya dang bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:75b-31: de nas las kyi rdo rjer bsgyur nas lha rnams
T02D2663b-2:75b-32: la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te mchod yon
T02D2663b-2:75b-33: phul nas dri dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod
T02D2663b-2:75b-34: pa rnams kyang so sor sngags kyis btab ste dbul
T02D2663b-2:75b-35: ba dang yid kyi mchod pa yang bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:75b-36: de ltar phyi nang gi mchod pa la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:75b-37: byas nas slob dpon de phyir byung la slob ma
T02D2663b-2:75b-38: rnams la dri dang me tog byin te las thams
T02D2663b-2:75b-39: cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrung ba dang /
T02D2663b-2:76a-1: pa'i sngags kyis btab pa'i skud pa dpung par bcing ba dang so shing sbyin pa rnams byas nas /
T02D2663b-2:76a-2: de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang lus dbul ba dang sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug ste /
T02D2663b-2:76a-3: de dag ni lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2663b-2:76a-4: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga yang sgrub pa'i
T02D2663b-2:76a-5: grogs po gzhan yod na nges rim pa bzhin du
T02D2663b-2:76a-6: bya la / med na slob dpon nyid kyis de
T02D2663b-2:76a-7: nyid du slob ma dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching
T02D2663b-2:76a-8: du gzhug pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya
T02D2663b-2:76a-9: dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:76a-10: chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:76a-11: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin du bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:76a-12: de nas slob dpon de ltar mchod pa'i gnas su zhugs te /
T02D2663b-2:76a-13: sems mnyam par bzhag la snying gar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2663b-2:76a-14: 'khor gyi steng du yi ger kha dog dkar po
T02D2663b-2:76a-15: yid tsam rtsa dmar ba bsams te /
T02D2663b-2:76a-16: yi ge de'i sgra'i de kho na nyid chos thams
T02D2663b-2:76a-17: cad rdul dang bral ba bsgom pa ni bdag gi
T02D2663b-2:76a-18: lus nyid rdul phra rab la sogs pa'i rim pas
T02D2663b-2:76a-19: bshig ste rdul phran de yang phyogs cha dang bral
T02D2663b-2:76a-21: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang dngos po med par bsgoms te /
T02D2663b-2:76a-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang yi ger dang stong par
T02D2663b-2:76a-23: bsam zhing tha ma sgra'i de kho na nyid de
T02D2663b-2:76a-24: yang dmigs su med par bsgoms te stong pa nyid
T02D2663b-2:76a-25: la ji srid 'dod par gnas so //
T02D2663b-2:76a-26: de'i 'og tu thog mar rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2663b-2:76a-28: de nas gser gyi dkyil 'khor bsam zhing gser gyi
T02D2663b-2:76a-29: dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bdag gi lus lte ba'i
T02D2663b-2:76a-30: 'og man chad kyang gser gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi
T02D2663b-2:76a-31: bar bsams te de'i steng du padmo rtsa ba dang
T02D2663b-2:76a-32: bcas pa snying ga'i bar du phyin par bsams la
T02D2663b-2:76a-33: / de'i dbus na bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs te /
T02D2663b-2:76a-34: de'i shar phyogs kyi padmo'i 'dab ma la de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog go //
T02D2663b-2:76a-35: lho phyogs kyi 'dab ma la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2663b-2:76a-36: me tog kun du rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'o
T02D2663b-2:76b-0: // byang phyogs @76b kyi 'dab ma la de bzhin gshegs pa rnga dbyangs can no //
T02D2663b-2:76b-1: nub phyogs kyi 'dab ma la de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:76b-2: shar lho'i 'dab ma la byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'o //
T02D2663b-2:76b-3: byang shar gyi 'dab ma la spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'o //
T02D2663b-2:76b-4: lho nub kyi 'dab ma la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:76b-5: nub byang gi 'dab ma byang chub sems dpa' byams
T02D2663b-2:76b-6: pa bsams te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663b-2:76b-7: la sogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams
T02D2663b-2:76b-8: kyang me tog dor ba la bde ba'i phyir de
T02D2663b-2:76b-9: rnams kun gyi sku bdag gi klad pa'i bar du
T02D2663b-2:76b-10: phyin par bsam zhing padmo'i ge sar kun la byang
T02D2663b-2:76b-11: chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum rnams dang sa bcu
T02D2663b-2:76b-12: dang pha rol tu phyi pa drug ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663b-2:76b-13: rnams lha mo'i gzugs su bsam mo //
T02D2663b-2:76b-14: padmo'i rtsa ba la byang chub sems dpa' phyag na
T02D2663b-2:76b-15: rdo rje bsam zhing de'i drung dang g-yas dang g-yon
T02D2663b-2:76b-16: dag tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i 'khor rnams
T02D2663b-2:76b-17: dang phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa dang khor bo
T02D2663b-2:76b-18: rnams dang sgo skyong dang khro gnyer la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:76b-19: rim pa bzhin du bsam mo //
T02D2663b-2:76b-20: de'i phyi rim du lha dang klu la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:76b-21: mang po rnams bsams te de ltar brtan par byas
T02D2663b-2:76b-22: nas yid kyi mchod pa tshul bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:76b-23: de nas de dag thams cad zin pa dang se
T02D2663b-2:76b-24: gol brdab pas brda byas te slob ma rnams mgo
T02D2663b-2:76b-25: bo la me tog 'dor du gzhug go //
T02D2663b-2:76b-26: me tog de dang kyang yid la bsam pa'i lha gang gi steng du babs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:76b-27: slob ma de la sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:76b-28: de dag ni bsdus pa'i don to //
T02D2663b-2:76b-29: tshig gi don ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po lus
T02D2663b-2:76b-30: kyis gzhi gang yin pa de chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D2663b-2:76b-31: rang bzhin gyi sngags dang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D2663b-2:76b-32: byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlab par bya ste
T02D2663b-2:76b-33: / rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro
T02D2663b-2:76b-34: zhes pa ni mchod pa la sogs pa sngar smos
T02D2663b-2:76b-35: pa rnams rim pa bzhin du byas nas bdag gi
T02D2663b-2:76b-36: lus chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang sngags kyis
T02D2663b-2:76b-38: stong pa nyid du byos shig ces pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:76b-39: de nas bdag las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin
T02D2663b-2:76b-40: gyis brlabs te zhes pa ni snga ma'i rim pa
T02D2663b-2:77a-1: 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas las kyi
T02D2663b-2:77a-2: rdo rje sems dpar bsgyur te mchod pa dang slob
T02D2663b-2:77a-3: ma'i cho ga bya ba la sogs pa thams cad
T02D2663b-2:77a-4: gong du smos pa'i rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:77a-5: rdul thams cad dang bral ba zhes pa ni de
T02D2663b-2:77a-6: nas slar bdag nyid nang du zhugs nas snying gar
T02D2663b-2:77a-7: yi ger bsams te chos thams cad rdul dang bral
T02D2663b-2:77a-8: bar bsgom pa'i rim pa yang snga ma bzhin du
T02D2663b-2:77a-9: bya'o // bdag dang sems can dang srog dang 'gro
T02D2663b-2:77a-10: ba dang shed can dang shed las skyes pa dang
T02D2663b-2:77a-11: bya'o // / byed pa po la sogs pa'i zug
T02D2663b-2:77a-12: rdu'i skyon dang bral la zhes pa ni mu stegs
T02D2663b-2:77a-13: can gzhan rnams kyis bdag la sogs pa'i dngos po
T02D2663b-2:77a-14: de rnams kyang dmigs su med par bsgoms zhes pa
T02D2663b-2:77a-15: bya'o // / ste / de dag ni ji ltar
T02D2663b-2:77a-16: rdo shing la sogs pa'i zug rdu dang nyes pa
T02D2663b-2:77a-17: bsal bas phyi rol gyi sbyang ba bzhin du nang
T02D2663b-2:77a-18: gis sbyang ba yang thabs 'di lta bus sbyong ngo
T02D2663b-2:77a-19: bya'o // / ste / zhes bshad pa'o // gru
T02D2663b-2:77a-20: bzhi la sgo bzhi dang ldan pa nub phyogs kyi
T02D2663b-2:77a-21: sgo rtag tu phye ba sgo khyud dang stegs bus
T02D2663b-2:77a-22: brgyan pa zhes pa ni de ltar stong pa nyid
T02D2663b-2:77a-23: la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin byas la de nas
T02D2663b-2:77a-24: rlung dang chu'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa snga ma
T02D2663b-2:77a-26: de'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor de'i steng
T02D2663b-2:77a-27: du bdag gi rked pa man chad gser gyi dkyil
T02D2663b-2:77a-28: 'khor gru bzhi par gyur par bsams te /
T02D2663b-2:77a-29: stegs bu zhes pa ni dbus kyi gzhi'i gdan de
T02D2663b-2:77a-30: nyid la bya la de yang gser gyi kha dog
T02D2663b-2:77a-31: tu bsam mo // dbus na padma'i rgyal po chen
T02D2663b-2:77a-32: po yid las byung ba 'dab ma brgyad pa sdong
T02D2663b-2:77a-33: bu dang bcas pa ze brgyas shing shin tu mdzes
T02D2663b-2:77a-34: par byung ba zhes pa la yid las byung ba
T02D2663b-2:77a-35: zhes pa ni padmo ste sngar bshad zin to //
T02D2663b-2:77a-36: shin tu mdzes par byung ba zhes pa ni 'dab
T02D2663b-2:77a-37: ma brgyad la sangs rgyas bzhi dang byang chub sems
T02D2663b-2:77a-38: dpa' bzhi rnams kyi sku mdog ci 'dra ba dang
T02D2663b-2:77a-39: mthun par kha dog sna tshogs su bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:77a-40: rin po che'i tog gi kha dog dkar po //
T02D2663b-2:77a-41: me tog kun du rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po'i kha dog ser po //
T02D2663b-2:77a-42: rnga dbyangs can gyi kha dog smug nag /'od dpag tu med pa'i kha dog dmar po //
T02D2663b-2:77b-0: de @77b bzhin du kun du bzang po ni ser po //
T02D2663b-2:77b-1: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po ni dkar po //
T02D2663b-2:77b-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pha ni ser po //
T02D2663b-2:77b-3: byams pa ni dmar por bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:77b-4: yang na thams cad kyang kho dag thams cad do
T02D2663b-2:77b-5: zhes pa dang sbyar te chad pa med par shes
T02D2663b-2:77b-6: par bya'o // de'i dbus na yang de bzhin gshegs
T02D2663b-2:77b-7: pa sku dang gsung dang thugs 'jig rten thams cad
T02D2663b-2:77b-8: las 'das pa zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam
T02D2663b-2:77b-9: par snang mdzad kyi sku padma'i dbus su bsams pa
T02D2663b-2:77b-10: de mchog tu bzang ba 'jig rten thams cad las
T02D2663b-2:77b-12: sems kyi sa las yang dag par 'das pa zhes
T02D2663b-2:77b-13: pa ni sems kyi yul du gyur pa'i gzung ba
T02D2663b-2:77b-14: dang 'dzin pa'i cha spangs zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:77b-15: sems kyi rjes su thob pa zhes pa'i stong pa

T02D2663b-2:104b-30: aam zhes pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa
T02D2663b-2:104b-31: snying gar bsams pa de ni yid las gyur pa
T02D2663b-2:104b-32: zhes bya la / de las kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sku'am /
T02D2663b-2:104b-33: sngags kyi lha gzhan rnams kyi skur 'byung bas na /
T02D2663b-2:104b-34: yid las gyur pa las byung zhing //
T02D2663b-2:104b-36: yid kyang shin tu rnam sbyangs na //
T02D2663b-2:104b-37: zhes pa ni sku de dag yid las 'byung ba
T02D2663b-2:104b-38: yang bsams pa tsam gyis chog pa ma yin gyi
T02D2663b-2:104b-39: / zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel par sbyangs pa las byung ba'i sku'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:104b-40: mgon po de na bzhugs pa las //
T02D2663b-2:104b-41: 'od zer sku las byung ba rnams //
T02D2663b-2:104b-42: zhes pa ni yid shin tu sbyangs pa de la
T02D2663b-2:104b-43: zhugs shing gnas pa'i snying po de las sngags kyi
T02D2663b-2:105a-2: 'od zer sku las byung ba rnams //
T02D2663b-2:105a-3: zhes pa ni snying po de las ka la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams 'byung zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:105a-4: yan lag gi ni yan lag nas //
T02D2663b-2:105a-5: rtag par kun du rnam par 'phro //
T02D2663b-2:105a-6: zhes pa la yan lag ni aa nyid la bya la /
T02D2663b-2:105a-7: yan lag de'i yan lag ni klad kor dang ai dang au la sogs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:105a-8: de rnams las sngags rnams 'byung bas na /
T02D2663b-2:105a-9: yan lag gi ni yan lag nas /
T02D2663b-2:105a-10: rtag par zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T02D2663b-2:105a-11: mdor na 'phags pa 'jam dpal lam sbyan ras gzigs
T02D2663b-2:105a-12: kyi dbang po'i skur bsgyur ba na gzhan ni rim
T02D2663b-2:105a-14: yi ge aa'i klad kor de las yi ge mam
T02D2663b-2:105a-15: la sogs pa gang yang rung ba 'byung bar bsams
T02D2663b-2:105a-16: te de'i 'od 'phros shing 'dus pa las 'jam dpal
T02D2663b-2:105a-17: la sogs pa'i skur bsgyur ro //
T02D2663b-2:105a-18: yang na aa'i gnas nyid du bsams te /
T02D2663b-2:105a-19: snga ma bzhin du skar bsgyur bar bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:105a-20: tshul 'di dag ni ma shes pas //
T02D2663b-2:105a-21: rmongs pa rnams kyis yongs mi shes //
T02D2663b-2:105a-22: zhes pa ni kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sku gcig
T02D2663b-2:105a-23: pu de las sngags kyi sku rnam pa mang po
T02D2663b-2:105a-24: de dag ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur snyam du yid
T02D2663b-2:105a-25: mi ches shing mi shes pa ni 'og nas 'byung
T02D2663b-2:105a-26: ba'i tshul 'di ma shes pa las yin no zhes
T02D2663b-2:105a-27: pa ste / lus kyi bye brag ji snyed pa //
T02D2663b-2:105a-28: brjod pa las ni mang du 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:105a-29: de bzhin sngags kyi mgon po yi //
T02D2663b-2:105a-30: bye brag dag kyang grags med gsungs //
T02D2663b-2:105a-31: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-2:105a-32: la sogs pa'i lus kyi bye brag mad po dag
T02D2663b-2:105a-33: brjod pa'i rang bzhin yi ge'i 'bru las rnam pa
T02D2663b-2:105a-35: sngags kyi mgon po kun du sangs rgyas pa las
T02D2663b-2:105a-36: sngags kyi lha'i bye brag grangs med pa 'byung ngo
T02D2663b-2:105a-37: zhes pa'o // kun du sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2663b-2:105a-38: de rnam par rtog pa las shin tu 'das na
T02D2663b-2:105a-39: des sku rnam pa mang po 'di rnams ji ltar
T02D2663b-2:105a-41: ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu ni //
T02D2663b-2:105a-42: dpal ldan 'dod pa'i don sgrub pa //
T02D2663b-2:105a-43: de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi //
T02D2663b-2:105a-44: sku yang don rnams thams cad sgrub //
T02D2663b-2:105a-46: ji ltar yid bzhin gyi nor bu de rnam par
T02D2663b-2:105b-0: mi rtog kyang @105b thams cad kyi re ba yongs
T02D2663b-2:105b-2: don thams cad sgrub pa de bzhin du /
T02D2663b-2:105b-3: sngags kyi mgon po 'jig rten gyi sgron ma de
T02D2663b-2:105b-4: yang rnam par mi rtog bzhin dus ngon gyi smon
T02D2663b-2:105b-5: lam gyi shugs kyis sku la sogs pa rnam pa
T02D2663b-2:105b-6: sna tshogs 'byung zhing don thams cad rab tu byed
T02D2663b-2:105b-7: do zhes pa'o // de nyid kyang nam mkha'i dpes bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:105b-8: gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi dbyings rnam par
T02D2663b-2:105b-9: mi rtog pa ji ltar dgos pa thams cad mngon
T02D2663b-2:105b-10: par sgrub ce na zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2663b-2:105b-11: te / de dag gi ni aam zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:105b-12: yi ge brgya pa de las bcom ldan 'das kun
T02D2663b-2:105b-14: sngags kyi lha rnams kyi skur bsgyur nas kyang yid
T02D2663b-2:105b-15: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsam pa'i sbyor
T02D2663b-2:105b-16: ba bshad do // 'dir ni de ltar bdag gi
T02D2663b-2:105b-17: lus kun du sangs rgyas pa'i sku la sogs par
T02D2663b-2:105b-18: yongs su bsgyur nas kun du sangs rgyas pa dang
T02D2663b-2:105b-19: rjes su mthun pa'i sems kyi yon tan bskyed pa'i
T02D2663b-2:105b-20: phyir sems yongs su sbyang bar bya ba 'chad de
T02D2663b-2:105b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi khams
T02D2663b-2:105b-23: ma lus pa rnam par sbyong ba'i tshig rnams kyis
T02D2663b-2:105b-24: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa la sems can
T02D2663b-2:105b-25: gyi khams ma lus pa rnam par sbyong ba'i tshig
T02D2663b-2:105b-26: ces pa ni ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa'i tshig ces
T02D2663b-2:105b-27: pa la sogs pa 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshig rnams
T02D2663b-2:105b-28: la bya ste / tshig de dag gis sems can
T02D2663b-2:105b-29: rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:105b-30: la bya ste / ni sel / ye shes khyad
T02D2663b-2:105b-31: par can skye bar byed pa'i sgo nas rnam par
T02D2663b-2:105b-33: sgrub pa'i sems yongs su sbyang bar bya ba yang
T02D2663b-2:105b-34: 'jug pa'i sems dang gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i
T02D2663b-2:105b-36: de la 'jug pa'i sems ni ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa'i tshig ces pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:105b-37: gang gi tshe na thog ma nas //
T02D2663b-2:105b-38: cung zad skye ba'am 'jig med pa //
T02D2663b-2:105b-39: de tshe rnal 'byor can dag gi //
T02D2663b-2:105b-40: stong pa'i ye shes ji ltar skye //
T02D2663b-2:105b-42: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig ces pa ni gnas pa'i sems 'chad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:105b-43: gang tshe chos zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2663b-2:106a-2: de tshe nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems //
T02D2663b-2:106a-5: yongs su gyur pa'i sgo yi tshig / ces pa ni ldang ba'i sems 'chad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:106a-6: de tshe 'jig rten kun mthun pa'i //
T02D2663b-2:106a-7: snying rje dag kyang skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:106a-9: de la ting nge 'dzin grub pa'i tshig ces pa
T02D2663b-2:106a-10: ni tshig des chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma
T02D2663b-2:106a-11: skyes shing mi 'gag par rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2663b-2:106a-13: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshig ces pa ni tshig
T02D2663b-2:106a-14: des chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nam mkha'
T02D2663b-2:106a-15: dang 'dra ba'i sems ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:106a-16: yongs su gyur pa'i sgo'i tshig ces pa ni tshig des ting nge 'dzin las yongs su gyur te /
T02D2663b-2:106a-17: langs nas snying rje'i dbang gis sems can gyi don bya ba la sogs pa ston pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:106a-18: gang gi tshe na thog ma nas //
T02D2663b-2:106a-19: cung zad skye ba'am 'jig med pa //
T02D2663b-2:106a-20: de tshe rnal 'byor can dag gi //
T02D2663b-2:106a-21: stong pa'i ye shes ji ltar skye //
T02D2663b-2:106a-22: zhes pa ni gang gi tshe phung po dang khams
T02D2663b-2:106a-23: la sogs pa'i chos rnams thog ma nas ma skyes
T02D2663b-2:106a-24: shing ma byung ba'i phyir 'chi 'pho ba yang med
T02D2663b-2:106a-25: de / de ltar phyi gzung ba'i chos med na
T02D2663b-2:106a-26: de la 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam par shes pa
T02D2663b-2:106a-27: yang skye ba'i gnas med pas mi skye'o //
T02D2663b-2:106a-28: de ltar gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i cha gnyis ka med de /
T02D2663b-2:106a-29: stong pa de'i tshe na rnal 'byor can gyi stong
T02D2663b-2:106a-30: pa'i ye shes kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2663b-2:106a-31: pa'o // gang tshe chos zhes bya ba de //
T02D2663b-2:106a-32: ngo bo nyid kyis ma rnyed pa //
T02D2663b-2:106a-33: de tshe nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems //
T02D2663b-2:106a-35: zhes pa ni gong du bshad pa'i rim gyis phyi'i
T02D2663b-2:106a-36: chos rnams dang nang gi rnam par shes pa gnyi
T02D2663b-2:106a-37: ga med par bshig na phung po la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:106a-38: chos 'di dag thams cad dmigs su med par rtog
T02D2663b-2:106a-39: pa la gnas pa'i sems ni nam mkha' dang 'dra
T02D2663b-2:106a-40: bar rtog pa thams cad bral bar 'gyur zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-2:106a-41: // rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems de las de
T02D2663b-2:106a-42: bzhin nyid kyi ye shes byang chub kyi mtshan nyid
T02D2663b-2:106a-43: can 'byung bas na de la byang chub 'byung ba
T02D2663b-2:106a-44: // zhes bya'o // de tshe 'jig rten kun mthun pa'i//
T02D2663b-2:106b-0: @106b snying rje dag kyang skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:106b-1: zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas
T02D2663b-2:106b-2: snying rje'i dbang gis sbyin pa la sogs pa dang
T02D2663b-2:106b-3: / spyod pa dang lha'i skur bsgyur ba la sogs
T02D2663b-2:106b-4: pa sems can gyi don bya ba dang ldan pa'i
T02D2663b-2:106b-6: de dag gi don mdor bsdu na dang por 'jug
T02D2663b-2:106b-7: pa'i sems rtog pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams stong
T02D2663b-2:106b-8: pa'i rang bzhin du bshig ste /
T02D2663b-2:106b-9: de nas stong pa nyid rtogs pa rnam par mi
T02D2663b-2:106b-10: rtog pa'i sems la ji srid 'dod par gnas nas
T02D2663b-2:106b-11: de'i 'og tu snying rje'i dbang gis lha'i gzugs su
T02D2663b-2:106b-13: sbyin pa la sogs pa sems can gyi don rnams la bya'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:106b-14: ming tsam gyi ni tshul du gnas //
T02D2663b-2:106b-15: zhes pa ni spyod pa de dag kyang don dam par yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2663b-2:106b-16: ming tsam du rtog pa'i gnas so zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:106b-17: da ltar thams cad ming tsam yin //
T02D2663b-2:106b-18: sngar kun du sangs rgyas pa'i skur bsgyur pa la
T02D2663b-2:106b-19: nan tan cher bya ba yang ji ltar dgos she
T02D2663b-2:106b-20: na / sangs rgyas ming du 'dir brjod do //
T02D2663b-2:106b-22: kun du sangs rgyas pa yang 'dir don dam par yod pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2663b-2:106b-23: ming tsam du zad do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:106b-24: de tshe stong dang mi stong zhes //
T02D2663b-2:106b-25: yang dag tu na ming du 'dogs //
T02D2663b-2:106b-26: zhes pa ni de'i tshe nam mkha' la sogs pa
T02D2663b-2:106b-27: stong pa'o zhes bya ba dang bum pa la sogs
T02D2663b-2:106b-28: pa chos rnams kun rdzob tu stong pa ma yin
T02D2663b-2:106b-29: no zhes pa yang ming tsam du bya'o zhes pa'o
T02D2663b-2:106b-30: // de la gcig gnyis gsum la sogs //
T02D2663b-2:106b-32: zhes pa ni yi ge aa zhes pa gcig pu
T02D2663b-2:106b-33: de las kyang ming can du bya ba'i sgo nas
T02D2663b-2:106b-34: ai la sogs pa'i yi ge'i dbye ba mang po
T02D2663b-2:106b-36: de ltar dpa' bo stong pa de //
T02D2663b-2:106b-37: rang 'byung rnams kyi byin rlabs las //
T02D2663b-2:106b-38: aa la sogs pa rim bzhin 'phel //
T02D2663b-2:106b-39: de ltar stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo las aa
T02D2663b-2:106b-40: dang ai la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyi bye
T02D2663b-2:106b-42: yid la gnas pa'i snying bo las so zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:106b-43: rang 'byung zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kun du sangs rgyas pa'i rang bzhin la bya ste /
T02D2663b-2:106b-44: sus kyang ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2663b-2:107a-1: chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las /
T02D2663b-2:107a-2: bdag nyid sgrub pa rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o /
T02D2663b-2:107a-4: // / rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs
T02D2663b-2:107a-5: par byang chub pa rnam par sprul ba byin gyis
T02D2663b-2:107a-6: rlob pa las / yi ge brgya pa'i sngags kyi
T02D2663b-2:107a-7: cho ga rim par phye ba'i 'grel pa mi snang
T02D2663b-2:107a-8: rlob pa las / ngo // de ni de bzhin
T02D2663b-2:107a-9: gshegs pa'i kun du byang chub pa'i rang bzhin bstan
T02D2663b-2:107a-10: rlob pa las / ngo // pa'i phyir / ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams na //
T02D2663b-2:107a-11: kun la rtag par mi gnas pa //
T02D2663b-2:107a-12: de bzhin chos rnams thams cad la //
T02D2663b-2:107a-13: gsang sngags mgon po mi gnas so //
T02D2663b-2:107a-14: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:107a-15: ji ltar nam mkha' lho byang dang shar nub la
T02D2663b-2:107a-16: sogs pa'i phyogs la mi gnas pa bzhin du don
T02D2663b-2:107a-17: dam pa'i mtshan nyid kyi sngags kyi mgon po de
T02D2663b-2:107a-18: yang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams la dmigs par
T02D2663b-2:107a-19: byed pa dang / dmigs par bya ba'i sgo nas mi gnas so zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:107a-20: ji ltar dngos rnams nam mkha' la //
T02D2663b-2:107a-21: gnas shing rtag tu rnam snang yang //
T02D2663b-2:107a-22: de ni gnas su mi 'gyur ba //
T02D2663b-2:107a-23: gsang sngags mgon po'ang de bzhin no //
T02D2663b-2:107a-24: zhes pa ni ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs kyi
T02D2663b-2:107a-25: dngos po rnams gnas par snang yang dngos po de
T02D2663b-2:107a-26: rnams la nam mkha' gnas par mi 'gyur ba bzhin
T02D2663b-2:107a-27: du de bzhin gshegs pa yang mngon par byang chub
T02D2663b-2:107a-28: pa'i tshe sku mi zad pa'i rdo rje'i rgyan la
T02D2663b-2:107a-29: sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams de'i dbang
T02D2663b-2:107a-30: gis byung ba yang byang chub kyi rang bzhin de
T02D2663b-2:107a-31: ni sku mi zad pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D2663b-2:107a-32: rgyan de rnams la dmigs pa'i sgo nas mi gnas
T02D2663b-2:107a-33: so zhes pa'o // nam mkha' dus gsum la sogs dang //
T02D2663b-2:107a-34: ji ltar bral bar 'dod pa bzhin //
T02D2663b-2:107a-35: de ltar gsang sngags mgon po yang //
T02D2663b-2:107a-36: dus gsum med kyang rnam par snang //
T02D2663b-2:107a-37: zhes pa ni ji ltar nam mkha' de rang bzhin
T02D2663b-2:107a-38: gcig las mi 'gyur bas na dus gsum las 'das
T02D2663b-2:107a-39: pa bzhin du de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin sngags
T02D2663b-2:107a-40: kyi mgon po de yang mi 'gyur bar yongs su
T02D2663b-2:107a-42: dus gsum la mi gnas par stobs dang mi 'jigs
T02D2663b-2:107b-0: pa la sogs pa'i @107b yon tan rnams snang ngo
T02D2663b-2:107b-1: zhes pa'o // ming tsam du ni gdags pa'i gnas //
T02D2663b-2:107b-2: byed pa po la sogs dang bral //
T02D2663b-2:107b-3: nam mkha' la ni tha snyad du //
T02D2663b-2:107b-4: mkhas pa rnams ni 'dogs par byed //
T02D2663b-2:107b-5: ming tsam gtogs par chu zad kyang //
T02D2663b-2:107b-6: yod pa ma yin nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D2663b-2:107b-7: de bzhin gsang sngags dbang phyug kyang //
T02D2663b-2:107b-8: tha snyad tsam du snang bar zad //
T02D2663b-2:107b-9: ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mi zad
T02D2663b-2:107b-10: pa'i rgyan yig 'brur byin gyis brlabs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2663b-2:107b-11: de don dam par dngos po yod pa ma yin
T02D2663b-2:107b-13: ji ltar nam mkha' ming du gdags pa tsam du gnas kyi /
T02D2663b-2:107b-14: nam mkha' de nyid med pa'i rang bzhin nam /
T02D2663b-2:107b-15: gzhan gyi sa byas pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin te /
T02D2663b-2:107b-16: nam mkha' zhes brjod pa tsam du zad kyi //
T02D2663b-2:107b-17: ming las lhag par nam mkha' zhes bya ba'i dngos
T02D2663b-2:107b-18: po yod pa ma yin pa de bzhin du sngags
T02D2663b-2:107b-19: kyi dbang phyug snying po de yang kun rdzob pa
T02D2663b-2:107b-20: tsam yongs su snang bar zad kyi dngos por mod
T02D2663b-2:107b-21: pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:107b-22: me dang chu dang rlung ma yin //
T02D2663b-2:107b-23: zhes pa la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:107b-24: byang chub kyi rang bzhin de ni me dang chu
T02D2663b-2:107b-25: la sogs pa chen po bzhi dang /
T02D2663b-2:107b-26: nyi ma dang zla ba la sogs pa chen po bzhi la gnas pa dang /
T02D2663b-2:107b-27: nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogs pa'i dus la
T02D2663b-2:107b-28: sogs pa ming gis smos pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
T02D2663b-2:107b-29: ma yin te / gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i go
T02D2663b-2:107b-30: 'phang thob par 'dod pa des ni ji skad du
T02D2663b-2:107b-31: smos pa'i dngos po 'di rnams dang bral ba'i byang
T02D2663b-2:107b-32: chub kyi rang bzhin de la nan tan bya'o zhes
T02D2663b-2:107b-33: ma yin te / pa'o // rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2663b-2:107b-34: chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam
T02D2663b-2:107b-35: par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las /

T02D2663b-2:111a-0: @111a * // ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi the tshom bsal ba'i phyir ro //

T02D2663b-2:111a-2: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2663b-2:111a-3: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas rim pa gzhan du bstan te /
T02D2663b-2:111a-4: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams //
T02D2663b-2:111a-5: the tshom yid gnyis bsal nas su //
T02D2663b-2:111a-6: spyad pa'i rgyal po bla med pa //
T02D2663b-2:111a-7: theg pa la ni spyod par 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:111a-8: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen
T02D2663b-2:111a-9: po rnams theg chen gyi sngags kyi spyad pa la
T02D2663b-2:111a-10: spyod pa ni the tshom dang yid gnyis spangs nas
T02D2663b-2:111a-11: theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa la spyod
T02D2663b-2:111a-12: pa'i phyir bdag gi the tshom bsal du gsol zhes
T02D2663b-2:111a-14: spyod pa'i rgyal po bla med pa //
T02D2663b-2:111a-15: zhes pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa nyid la bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:111a-16: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2663b-2:111a-17: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs //
T02D2663b-2:111a-18: gang zhig de rtogs 'dod pa de //
T02D2663b-2:111a-19: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:111a-21: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lags //
T02D2663b-2:111a-23: des ni 'di skad du gsungs pa yin te chos
T02D2663b-2:111a-24: thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D2663b-2:111a-25: nyid kyi ye shes gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la
T02D2663b-2:111a-26: sogs pa'i rtog pa thams cad spangs pa nam mkha'
T02D2663b-2:111a-27: lta bu nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa
T02D2663b-2:111a-28: med pa de ni byang chub ste /
T02D2663b-2:111a-29: de lta bu'i byang chub rtogs par 'dod pa gang
T02D2663b-2:111a-30: yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya
T02D2663b-2:111a-31: ste / de yang sa dang po la gnas pa nas //
T02D2663b-2:111a-32: sa dgu pa man chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:111a-33: gang gis sa bcu bsgrubs nas ni //
T02D2663b-2:111a-35: sangs rgyas zhes ni bya ba yin //
T02D2663b-2:111a-37: ji ltar sangs rgyas zhes ni bgyi //
T02D2663b-2:111a-38: zhes zhus pa'i lan te sa de yongs su rdzogs
T02D2663b-2:111a-39: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji skad du grags pa'i
T02D2663b-2:111a-40: dbang bcu la yang dbang du gyur pa'i ting nge
T02D2663b-2:111a-41: 'dzin gnas pa dang langs pa gnyis ka'i tshen yang
T02D2663b-2:111a-42: snying po la sogs pa'i chos rnams sgyu ma lta
T02D2663b-2:111a-43: bur rtogs shing rten pa rnams kyi rgyud kun rtog
T02D2663b-2:111a-44: dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang
T02D2663b-2:111a-45: sgyu ma lta bur shes pa de ni sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:111a-47: byang chub sems dpa' ji skad phal mo che rnams
T02D2663b-2:111b-0: kyis kyang chos rnams stong pa @111b nyid dang sgyu
T02D2663b-2:111b-1: ma lta bur rtogs shing 'jig rten kun gyi rgyud
T02D2663b-2:111b-3: mi mthun phyogs thams cad du ma spangs pas chos
T02D2663b-2:111b-4: rnams stong pa nyid dang sgyu mar rtogs pa'i mnyam
T02D2663b-2:111b-5: par gzhag pa langs pa'i chos mi mthun pa'i phyogs
T02D2663b-2:111b-7: de bas nas bcu dang dbang bcus rdzogs par sangs
T02D2663b-2:111b-8: rgyas pa zhes khyad par du gsungs pas sangs rgyas
T02D2663b-2:111b-9: pa zhes bya ba ni log pa'i gnyen po la
T02D2663b-2:111b-10: sogs pa spangs nas phyin ci ma log par khong
T02D2663b-2:111b-12: chos ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2663b-2:111b-13: gnyis su med cing mtshan nyid gcig / stobs bcus rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa //
T02D2663b-2:111b-14: de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas shes bya //
T02D2663b-2:111b-16: ji ltar rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2663b-2:111b-18: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas zhes bya
T02D2663b-2:111b-19: ba rnams stong par rtogs pa yang mtshan nyid so
T02D2663b-2:111b-20: so bar rtogs pa yin la /
T02D2663b-2:111b-21: de las lhag par mtshan nyid so so bar stong
T02D2663b-2:111b-22: par rtogs pa gang yin pa de rnams la gzugs
T02D2663b-2:111b-23: kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de tshor ba'i
T02D2663b-2:111b-25: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang tshor ba'i stong pa
T02D2663b-2:111b-26: nyid ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med
T02D2663b-2:111b-27: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul du chos thams
T02D2663b-2:111b-28: cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ltar gnyis su med cing
T02D2663b-2:111b-29: mtshan nyid gcig tu stobs bcus yongs su rdzogs nas
T02D2663b-2:111b-30: kun rtog pa de ni kun du sangs rgyas pa
T02D2663b-2:111b-31: zhes bya ste / de yang phung po lhag ma
T02D2663b-2:111b-32: dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa kun du
T02D2663b-2:111b-33: bzang po'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2663b-2:111b-34: zhes bya ste / la bya'o // rgyal ba mchog
T02D2663b-2:111b-35: ces pa ni bdud bzhi las rgyal ba'i phyir ro
T02D2663b-2:111b-36: zhes bya ste / la bya'o // // 'du shes tsam yang sangs rgyas pa'i phyir //
T02D2663b-2:111b-37: rang gi ngo bor bstan du med //
T02D2663b-2:111b-38: ye shes rang rig bya ba ni //
T02D2663b-2:111b-39: de ni de bzhin gshegs par bshad //
T02D2663b-2:111b-41: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lags //
T02D2663b-2:111b-43: kun du sangs rgyas pa'i chos thams cad stong pa'i
T02D2663b-2:111b-44: mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa'i 'du shes tsam po
T02D2663b-2:111b-46: rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin du bstan du med
T02D2663b-2:111b-47: pa lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
T02D2663b-2:112a-0: @112a * // pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:112a-1: rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2663b-2:112a-2: byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob
T02D2663b-2:112a-3: pa las / de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa rim pa phye brgyas pa'o /
T02D2663b-2:112a-5: // / da ni me rnams kyi rabs bshad de /
T02D2663b-2:112a-6: de yang bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D2663b-2:112a-7: spyad pa spyod pa na bram ze la sogs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:112a-8: mu stegs pa rnams log pa la phyogs shing sems
T02D2663b-2:112a-9: can rgyun chags su gsod pa la sogs pa'i sdig
T02D2663b-2:112a-10: pa'i las spyod pa rnams sems can rgyun du gsod
T02D2663b-2:112a-11: pa las grangs bsnyung pa'i phyir /
T02D2663b-2:112a-12: lha la gtor ma dbul ba'i tshe sems can gsod
T02D2663b-2:112a-13: pa ma gtogs par dus gzhan du sems can mi
T02D2663b-2:112a-14: gsod do zhes pa la sogs pa mu stegs kyi
T02D2663b-2:112a-15: gzhung las dge ba'i phyogs su 'chad pa dang bram
T02D2663b-2:112a-16: ze'i rig byed las me bshad pa rnams kyang bcom
T02D2663b-2:112a-17: ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan par shes bar bya ste
T02D2663b-2:112a-18: / de ltar cis mngon zhe na /
T02D2663b-2:112a-19: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las ji skad du
T02D2663b-2:112a-20: legs par smras pa cung zad du zhig yod pa
T02D2663b-2:112a-21: rnams kyang ngas bstan to zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro
T02D2663b-2:112a-22: // lag na rdo rje gzhan yang dus gcig gi tshe na nga byang chub sems dpar gyur te /
T02D2663b-2:112a-23: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing tshangs pa'i
T02D2663b-2:112a-24: 'jig rten na 'dug pa na tshangs pas nga la
T02D2663b-2:112a-25: kye'i tshangs pa chen po me la rnam pa du
T02D2663b-2:112a-26: yod par shes par bya zhes dris pa dang zhes
T02D2663b-2:112a-27: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2663b-2:112a-28: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
T02D2663b-2:112a-29: pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na tshangs pa'i gcugs

T02D2663b-2:112a-33: 'di skad ces dris so zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:112a-34: ngas de la 'di skad ces smras so zhes pa
T02D2663b-2:112a-35: ni tshangs pa de langs 'og nas 'byung pa'i tshig
T02D2663b-2:112a-37: / de la mi nga rgyal can gang yin pa
T02D2663b-2:112a-38: de ni rang byung ba'o zhes pa ni bskal pa
T02D2663b-2:112a-39: dang po'i tshe 'jig rten thams cad sus kyang ma
T02D2663b-2:112a-40: byas par rang byung nas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing
T02D2663b-2:112a-41: dga' ba'i zas za ste de'i tshe yang me tshangs
T02D2663b-2:112a-42: pa'i 'jig rten du rang byung ste /
T02D2663b-2:112b-0: nga ni rang byung ste @112b sus kyang ma byas
T02D2663b-2:112b-1: snyam pa'i nga rgyal yod pas nga rgyal can rang
T02D2663b-2:112b-3: me de lta bu dang por byung ngo zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:112b-4: de'i 'og na tshangs pa'i bu ste /
T02D2663b-2:112b-5: de las skyes pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:112b-6: 'jig rten pa'i me pa ba ka / tshangs pa'i bu ni dang po yin //
T02D2663b-2:112b-7: zhes pa ni rang byung ba'i med 'og tu pa
T02D2663b-2:112b-8: ba ka zhes bya ba 'jig rtan pa'i btso zhing
T02D2663b-2:112b-9: sreg par byed pa'i me tshangs pa las byung ste
T02D2663b-2:112b-10: / de yang tshangs pa'i bu de rnams kyi nang na dang po'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:112b-11: de'i bu tshangs pa'i zas zhes pa ni 'jig rten
T02D2663b-2:112b-12: pa'i me pa ba ka zhes bya ba de'i bu'o

T02D2663b-2:112b-16: de'i bu bee shva na ra dang //
T02D2663b-2:112b-17: ha ba na dang bsreg bya len //
T02D2663b-2:112b-18: zhes pa ni bee shva na ra dang /
T02D2663b-2:112b-19: ha ba na dang bsreg bya la na zhes bya
T02D2663b-2:112b-20: ba'i me de rnams ni bh'a ra ta zhes bya

T02D2663b-2:112b-22: bu yin par ni rgya mtsho grags //
T02D2663b-2:112b-23: zhes pa ni ngos bsrungs zhes bya ba'i me ni aa thar pa na zhes bya'i me'i bu ste /

T02D2663b-2:112b-25: rlung zhes bya ba'i me de ni //
T02D2663b-2:112b-26: mngal du 'jug pa'i cho gar bshad //
T02D2663b-2:112b-27: ces pa ni bram ze'i cho ga las mngal du
T02D2663b-2:112b-28: 'jug par bya ba'i tshe sbyin sreg bya ba'i me
T02D2663b-2:112b-30: de nas mi khrus bya pa la //
T02D2663b-2:112b-31: de bzhin p'a ba m'a na ra shes //
T02D2663b-2:112b-32: zhes pa ni mngal du zhugs nas sbrum par gyur
T02D2663b-2:112b-33: pa na bu de'i ched du khrus bya ba'i tshe
T02D2663b-2:112b-34: sbyin sreg bya ba'i me ni p'a ba m'a na
T02D2663b-2:112b-35: zhes bya'o // bkra shis zhes bya mtshams kyi mthar //

T02D2663b-2:112b-37: btsas pa'i las la pra gal la bha'o //

T02D2663b-2:112b-39: sreg bya ba'i me ni pra gal la bha zhes

T02D2663b-2:113a-0: zhes pa ni bu lo brgyad lon nas @113a * //

T02D2663b-2:113a-6: bag ma len la sbyor byed bshad //

T02D2663b-2:113a-8: aagne yas ni khyim kha bsro //
T02D2663b-2:113a-9: zhes pa ni khyim kha bsro ba'i tshe sbyin sreg bya ba'i me ni aagne ya zhes bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:113a-10: nye bar 'bul la me nyid do //

T02D2663b-2:113a-16: tshogs pa la sbyin sreg bya ba'i me ni pa

T02D2663b-2:113a-20: de bzhin yon dbul ba la zhi //

T02D2663b-2:113a-25: zhes pa'o // de bzhin phyugs ni bcing ba la //

T02D2663b-2:113a-28: ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba'i me ni aa ba ni

T02D2663b-2:113b-23: 'di ni me rnams mdor bsdus nas //
T02D2663b-2:113b-24: nges par khyod la bshad pa ste //
T02D2663b-2:113b-25: rig byed thos pa spyod rnams kyi //
T02D2663b-2:113b-26: tshangs pa'i bu dag brjod pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:113b-27: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'di dag gi //
T02D2663b-2:113b-28: de yi tshe na ngas bstan to //
T02D2663b-2:113b-29: zhes pa de la me nga rgyal can gang yin pa de ni rang byung ba'o zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:113b-30: ngos bsrungs aa thar na ba yi //
T02D2663b-2:113b-31: bu yin bar ni rgya mtshor grags //

T02D2663b-2:113b-33: rlung zhes bya ba'i me de ni //
T02D2663b-2:113b-34: mngal du 'jug pa'i cho gar bshad //

T02D2663b-2:113b-37: de ni dbang gi don du bshad //
T02D2663b-2:113b-38: ces pa'i bar ni las rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi me bstan pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:113b-39: nags tshal sreg la pho nya'i me //
T02D2663b-2:113b-41: zad tshe 'jig pa zhes bya ste //
T02D2663b-2:113b-42: dus mtha'i mer ni yang dag bsgrags //
T02D2663b-2:113b-43: zhes pa'i bar ni me rnams kyi ngang tshul las rang bzhin bstan pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:113b-44: de rnams bram ze la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2663b-2:113b-45: gzhung las grags shing 'jig rten pa'i las byed pa'o
T02D2663b-2:113b-46: // gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la //
T02D2663b-2:113b-47: me rnams rang bzhin mi shes par //
T02D2663b-2:113b-48: gang dag sbyin sreg byed pa de //
T02D2663b-2:114a-0: sbyin sreg ma yin legs byas @114a * //
T02D2663b-2:114a-3: zhes pa ni me rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes
T02D2663b-2:114a-4: na cho ga dang 'gal bas sbyin sreg byas par
T02D2663b-2:114a-5: mi chud la / legs byas min zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:114a-6: sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jag ma dgram pa la
T02D2663b-2:114a-7: sogs pa'i legs byas rnams kyang legs byas su mi
T02D2663b-2:114a-10: zhes pa ni gang gi phyir sbyin sreg brtsams pa'i las de'i 'bras bur mi 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:114a-11: ngas byad chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas

T02D2663b-2:114a-17: pa'i sbyin sreg la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir me
T02D2663b-2:114a-18: rnam pa bcu gnyis pa 'di bstan to zhes pa'o

T02D2663b-2:114a-23: gnyis pa 'dzin byed ces bya ste //
T02D2663b-2:114a-25: bgrang phreng ril ba sbyi blugs thogs //
T02D2663b-2:114a-26: zhes pa'i bar ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi me'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:114a-27: gsum pa rlung zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2663b-2:114a-28: mdog med gnag la rtsub pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:114a-29: zhes pa ni rlung zhes pa'i me de me thab tu me spar pa'i tshe bod pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:114a-30: bzhi pa dmar po zhes bya ste //
T02D2663b-2:114a-31: nub kha'i mtshams kyi dmar thag 'dra //
T02D2663b-2:114a-32: zhes pa ni dbang gi sbyin sreg gi me'o //
T02D2663b-2:114a-33: lnga pa mri ta zhes bya ba //
T02D2663b-2:114a-34: sbun la kha dog kham pa ste //
T02D2663b-2:114a-35: mgrin pa ring zhing gzi brjid che //
T02D2663b-2:114a-36: kun la phan ni 'dogs par bshad //

T02D2663b-2:114a-38: drug pa khro na'o zhes bya ste //

T02D2663b-2:114a-40: gyen du skra brdze sa sgra chen 'byin //
T02D2663b-2:114a-41: mche ba bzhi pa stobs po che'o //

T02D2663b-2:114a-44: rno la kha dog kun dang ldan //

T02D2663b-2:114a-47: sems can thams cad rmugs byed pa'o //

T02D2663b-2:114b-5: zhes pa ni zhi ba dang rgyas ba gang yang

T02D2663b-2:114b-7: kha dog bsgyur ro zhes pa ste /

T02D2663b-2:114b-25: gsang ba pa'i bdag po byams pa chen po dang
T02D2663b-2:114b-26: snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ni zhi ba'o
T02D2663b-2:114b-27: zhes pa ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba la
T02D2663b-2:114b-28: byams ba dang snying rje lhag par bskyed do zhes

T02D2663b-2:114b-30: zhes pa ni rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg la dga' ba
T02D2663b-2:114b-31: lhag par bskyed do zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:114b-32: khro bo'i mes ni zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:114b-33: khro ba thul bas bya ba'o //
T02D2663b-2:114b-34: zhes pa'i bar ni mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gsungs pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:114b-35: khro bar bya ba yang ldang pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /

T02D2663b-2:114b-38: dbus su rlung gi me gzhag go //
T02D2663b-2:114b-39: zhes pa ni dang por zhugs thab tu me sbar
T02D2663b-2:114b-40: ba'i tshe rlung gi me bos nas rlung g-yab kyis
T02D2663b-2:114b-41: me sbar bar bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:114b-42: gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar ji skad bsgrags
T02D2663b-2:114b-43: pa'i gnas de dang de dag tu ji ltar rigs

T02D2663b-2:114b-46: gnas ji skad du gsungs pa de dag gar rigs
T02D2663b-2:114b-47: par zhi ba la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg rnams bya'o
