T02D2663b-2:115a-1: na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to zhes pa nas /
T02D2663b-2:115a-2: ji ltar bsam pa bdag la gsungs //
T02D2663b-2:115a-3: zhes pa'i bar ni gong du sbyin sreg mdor bstan
T02D2663b-2:115a-4: pa de la me thab ji ltar bya ba dang
T02D2663b-2:115a-5: / me bsang ba'i phyir chus gtor ba ni ji ltar gtor ba dang /
T02D2663b-2:115a-6: me thab kyi mthar 'jag ma ji ltar gding ba dang /
T02D2663b-2:115a-7: me thab tu me ji ltar gzhag pa zhus pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:115a-9: de la me yi thab khung ni //
T02D2663b-2:115a-10: kun du khru gang tsam gyi tshad //
T02D2663b-2:115a-11: kha khyer sor bzhi'i tshad du bya //
T02D2663b-2:115a-12: rdo rje'i mtshan ma dag gis mtshan //
T02D2663b-2:115a-14: me yi thab khung ji ltar bgyi //
T02D2663b-2:115a-16: me thab khor khor yug tu khru gang tsam la
T02D2663b-2:115a-17: kha khyer yang zheng dang dpangs su sor bzhi par
T02D2663b-2:115a-18: bya ste / zhabs su rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan par bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:115a-19: thab khung gi ni g-yas phyogs nas //
T02D2663b-2:115a-20: ku sha'i rtsva ni rlon pa dgram //
T02D2663b-2:115a-21: rtse mo dag kyang rtsa bas dkri //
T02D2663b-2:115a-22: rtsa ba dag kyang rtse mos dkri //
T02D2663b-2:115a-24: ku sha'i rtsva yang ji ltar dgram //
T02D2663b-2:115a-25: zhes zhus pa'i lan te go bar zad do //
T02D2663b-2:115a-26: 'dir ni bsang gtor g-yas phyogs nas //
T02D2663b-2:115a-27: ku sha bskor ba bzhin du bya //
T02D2663b-2:115a-29: bsang gtor dag kyang ji ltar bgyi //
T02D2663b-2:115a-31: me bsang ba'i phyir chu gtor ba yang 'jag ma
T02D2663b-2:115a-32: bskor pa'i tshul du g-yas phyogs nas bskor zhing gdab
T02D2663b-2:115a-33: po zhes pa'o // byug spos me tog bdug spos dag / mri ta'i me la dbul bar bya //
T02D2663b-2:115a-35: mkhas pas de la dbul bar bya //
T02D2663b-2:115a-37: ji ltar bsam pa bdag la gsungs //
T02D2663b-2:115a-39: me thab der thog mar me tog gcig gzhag ste /
T02D2663b-2:115a-40: mri ta'i me bos la dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D2663b-2:115a-41: de nas yang chus bsangs la gang ba'i sbyin sreg
T02D2663b-2:115a-42: lan gsum me de nyid kyi sngags kyis btab ste
T02D2663b-2:115a-44: de nas zhi pa'i sbyin sreg gam //
T02D2663b-2:115a-45: yang na rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2663b-2:115a-47: phyi rol pa zhes gsungs pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:115a-48: zhes pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i rim pas me
T02D2663b-2:115a-49: thab kyi cho ga bya ba dang mri ta'i me
T02D2663b-2:115a-50: la gang ba'i sbyin sreg byin te /
T02D2663b-2:115a-51: me de rang gi gnas su gzhag la //

T02D2663b-2:115b-4: rten gyi sbyin sreg gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:115b-5: gzhan yang nang gi sbyin sreg ni /
T02D2663b-2:115b-7: de ni nang gi sbyin sreg ces //
T02D2663b-2:115b-8: des pa khyod la bstan pa yin //
T02D2663b-2:115b-9: zhes pa'i bar ni nang gi sbyin sreg bshad pa ste /
T02D2663b-2:115b-10: de yang bdag nyid kyi phung po lnga stong pa nyid du bshig la /
T02D2663b-2:115b-11: phyi rol gyi me thab la sogs pa yul gyi gzugs rnams kyang stong par bshig ste /
T02D2663b-2:115b-12: de bzhin du sgo drug gi rnam par shes pa
T02D2663b-2:115b-13: 'phro ba rnams kyang so sor bshig nas mi 'phro

T02D2663b-2:115b-17: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ni nang gi
T02D2663b-2:115b-18: sbyin sreg ste / de bas na /

T02D2663b-2:115b-20: yid kyis me la sbyin sreg bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2663b-2:115b-21: rlung gi me bkag pa ni srog dang rtsol ba rab tu bsngams nas zhes pa'o //
T02D2663b-2:115b-22: yid kyis me la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2663b-2:115b-23: zhes pa ni sems mi g-yo par bsreg go zhes pa'o //

T02D2663b-2:115b-26: yod par gnas pas spyad par bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D2663b-2:115b-27: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni snod du ma gyur

T02D2663b-2:115b-32: pa gzhan su la yang ma sbyin cig ces gsungs

T02D2663b-2:115b-40: yin pa brtags te shes par byas nas de lta
T02D2663b-2:115b-41: bu la sogs pa'i skyon rnams med cing snod du

T02D2663b-2:116a-5: bstan pa 'di la bshad du gsol //

T02D2663b-2:116a-15: byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob

T02D2663b-2:116a-22: chub pa rnam par sbrul pa byin gyis rlob pa'i
T02D2663b-2:116a-23: rgyud chen po slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas phyin
T02D2663b-2:116a-24: ci ma log par bshad pa rdzogs so /

T02D2663b-2:116a-27: chub pa'i rgyud kyi tshig 'grel zhes grags pa 'di

T02D2663b-2:116a-29: bcos bod kyi yul du 'gyur ba ji ltar snyed
T02D2663b-2:116a-31: 'grel ba 'di'i dpe phyi mo ma dag cing gong

T02D2663b-2:116a-38: yul dbus kyi bande gzhon nu dpal zhes bgyi bas
